  17module biasCorrectionSat_mod
  18  ! MODULE biasCorrectionSat_mod (prefix="bcs" category='1. High-level functionality')
  19  !
  20  !:Purpose: Performs the variational bias correction for satellite radiance
  21  !           data
  22  !
  23  use utilities_mod
  24  use ramDisk_mod
  25  use MathPhysConstants_mod
  26  use obsSpaceData_mod
  27  use controlVector_mod
  28  use midasMpi_mod
  29  use rttov_const, only : ninst
  30  use tovs_nl_mod
  31  use timeCoord_mod
  32  use columnData_mod
  33  use codePrecision_mod
  34  use localizationFunction_mod
  35  use HorizontalCoord_mod
  36  use verticalCoord_mod
  37  use gridStateVector_mod
  38  use gridStateVectorFileIO_mod
  39  use stateToColumn_mod
  40  use codtyp_mod
  41  use timeCoord_mod
  42  use clib_interfaces_mod
  43  use obserrors_mod
  44  use fSQLite
  45  use obsfiles_mod
  46
  47  implicit none
  48  save
  49  private
  50
  51  public :: bcs_setup, bcs_calcBias_tl, bcs_calcBias_ad, bcs_writeBias, bcs_finalize
  52  public :: bcs_removeBiasCorrection, bcs_refreshBiasCorrection
  53  public :: bcs_do_regression, bcs_filterObs, bcs_computeResidualsStatistics, bcs_calcBias
  54  public :: bcs_removeOutliers, bcs_applyBiasCorrection
  55  public :: bcs_mimicSatbcor
  56  public :: bcs_readConfig
  57  public :: bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning
  58
  59  type  :: struct_chaninfo
  60    integer :: numActivePredictors
  61    logical :: isDynamic
  62    integer :: channelNum
  63    character(len=1) :: bcmode
  64    character(len=1) :: bctype
  65    integer, allocatable  :: predictorIndex(:)
  66    real(8), allocatable  :: coeff(:)
  67    real(8), allocatable  :: coeffIncr(:)
  68    real(8), allocatable  :: coeff_fov(:)
  69    real(8), allocatable  :: coeff_offset(:)
  70    integer               :: coeff_nobs
  71    real(8), allocatable  :: coeffIncr_fov(:)
  72    real(8), allocatable  :: stddev(:)
  73    real(8), allocatable  :: coeffCov(:,:)
  74  end type struct_chaninfo
  75
  76  type  :: struct_bias
  77    type(struct_chaninfo), allocatable :: chans(:)
  78    integer :: numscan
  79    integer :: numChannels
  80    real(8), allocatable  :: BHalfScanBias(:,:)
  81    real(8), allocatable  :: BMinusHalfScanBias(:,:)
  82  end type struct_bias
  83
  84  type(struct_bias), allocatable  :: bias(:)
  85  type(struct_vco),       pointer :: vco_mask => null()
  86  type(struct_hco),       pointer :: hco_mask => null()
  87  type(struct_columnData) :: column_mask
  88  logical               :: initialized = .false.
  89  logical               :: bcs_mimicSatbcor
  90  logical               :: doRegression
  91  integer, parameter    :: NumPredictors = 7
  92  integer, parameter    :: NumPredictorsBcif = 6
  93  integer, parameter    :: maxfov = 120
  94  integer, parameter    :: maxNumInst = 25
  95  
  96  real(8), allocatable  :: trialHeight300m1000(:)
  97  real(8), allocatable  :: trialHeight50m200(:)
  98  real(8), allocatable  :: trialHeight1m10(:)
  99  real(8), allocatable  :: trialHeight5m50(:)
 100  real(8), allocatable  :: RadiosondeWeight(:)
 101  real(8), allocatable  :: trialTG(:)
 102  integer               :: nobs
 103  integer, external     :: fnom, fclos 
 104  character(len=2), parameter  :: predTab(0:7) = [ "SB", "KK","T1", "T2", "T3", "T4", "SV", "TG"]
 105  ! Namelist variables
 106  character(len=5) :: biasMode  ! "varbc" for varbc, "reg" to compute bias correction coefficients by regression, "apply" to compute and apply bias correction
 107  logical  :: biasActive        ! logical variable to activate the module
 108  logical  :: outstats          ! flag to activate output of residual statistics in "reg" mode 
 109  logical  :: mimicSatbcor      ! in "reg" mode compute regression coefficients the same way as the original satbcor program
 110  logical  :: weightedestimate  ! flag to activate radiosonde weighting for bias correction computation in "reg" mode
 111  logical  :: filterObs         ! flag to activate additional observation filtering in "reg" mode. If it is .false. only observations selected for assimilation will be used in the linear regression
 112  logical  :: removeBiasCorrection  ! flag to activate removal of an already present bias correction
 113  logical  :: refreshBiasCorrection !flag to replace an existing bias correction with a new one
 114  logical  :: centerPredictors      ! flag to transparently remove predictor mean in "reg" mode (more stable problem; very little impact on the result)
 115  logical  :: outCoeffCov           ! flag to activate output of coefficients error covariance (useful for EnKF system)
 116  logical  :: outOmFPredCov         ! flag to activate output of O-F/predictors coefficients covariances and correlations
 117  real(8)  :: scanBiasCorLength     ! if positive and .not. mimicSatBcor use error correlation between scan positions with the given correlation length
 118  real(8)  :: bg_stddev(NumPredictors) ! background error for predictors ("varbc" mode)
 119  character(len=7) :: cinst(maxNumInst)   ! to read the bcif file for each instrument in cinst
 120  character(len=3) :: cglobal(maxNumInst) ! a "global" parameter and
 121  integer          :: nbscan( maxNumInst)  ! the number of scan positions are necessary
 122  ! To understand the meaning of the following parameters controling filtering,
 123  ! please see  https://wiki.cmc.ec.gc.ca/images/f/f6/Unified_SatRad_Dyn_bcor_v19.pdf pages 20-22
 124  logical  :: offlineMode   ! flag to select offline mode for bias correction computation
 125  logical  :: allModeSsmis  ! flag to select "ALL" mode for SSMIS
 126  logical  :: allModeTovs   ! flag to select "ALL" mode for TOVS (AMSU-A, AMSU-B, MHS, ATMS, MWHS-2)
 127  logical  :: allModeCsr    ! flag to select "ALL" mode for CSR (GOES, SEVIRI, MVIRI, ABI, etc..)
 128  logical  :: allModeHyperIr! flag to select "ALL" mode for hyperSpectral Infrared (AIRS, IASI, CrIS)
 129  logical  :: dumpToSqliteAfterThinning  ! option to output all usefull parameters to sqlite files after thinning
 130  namelist /nambiassat/ biasActive, biasMode, bg_stddev, removeBiasCorrection, refreshBiasCorrection
 131  namelist /nambiassat/ centerPredictors, scanBiasCorLength, mimicSatbcor, weightedEstimate
 132  namelist /nambiassat/ cglobal, cinst, nbscan, filterObs, outstats, outCoeffCov
 133  namelist /nambiassat/ offlineMode, allModeSsmis, allModeTovs, allModeCsr, allModeHyperIr
 134  namelist /nambiassat/ dumpToSqliteAfterThinning, outOmFPredCov
 135contains
 136 
 137  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 138  ! bcs_readConfig
 139  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 140  subroutine bcs_readConfig()
 141    !
 142    !:Purpose: Read nambiassat namelist section
 143    !
 144    implicit none
 145
 146    ! Locals:
 147    integer  :: ierr, nulnam
 148    logical, save :: firstCall = .true.
 149
 150    if (.not. firstCall) return
 151    firstCall = .false.
 152
 153    ! set default values for namelist variables
 154    biasActive = .false.
 155    biasMode = "varbc"
 156    bg_stddev(:) = 0.0d0
 157    removeBiasCorrection = .false.
 158    filterObs = .false.
 159    refreshBiasCorrection = .false.
 160    centerPredictors = .false.
 161    mimicSatbcor = .true.
 162    scanBiasCorLength = -1.d0
 163    weightedEstimate = .false.
 164    outCoeffCov = .false.
 165    outOmFPredCov = .false.
 166    nbscan(:) = -1
 167    cinst(:) = "XXXXXXX"
 168    cglobal(:) = "XXX"
 169    outstats = .false.
 170    offlineMode = .false.
 171    allModeSsmis = .true.
 172    allModeTovs = .true.
 173    allModeCsr = .true.
 174    allModeHyperIr = .false.
 175    dumpToSqliteAfterThinning = .false.
 176    !
 177    ! read in the namelist NAMBIASSAT
 178    if (utl_isNamelistPresent('nambiassat', './flnml')) then
 179      nulnam = 0
 180      ierr = fnom(nulnam, './flnml', 'FTN+SEQ+R/O', 0)
 181      read(nulnam,nml=nambiassat,iostat=ierr)
 182      if (ierr /= 0) call utl_abort('bcs_readConfig: Error reading namelist section nambiassat')
 183      if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,nml=nambiassat)
 184      ierr = fclos(nulnam)
 185    else
 186      write(*,*)
 187      write(*,*) 'bcs_readconfig: nambiassat is missing in the namelist. The default value will be taken.'
 188    end if
 189
 190    bcs_mimicSatbcor = mimicSatbcor
 191    doRegression = (trim(biasMode) == "reg")
 192
 193  end subroutine bcs_readConfig
 194
 195  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 196  ! bcs_setup
 197  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 198  subroutine bcs_setup()
 199    implicit none
 200
 201    ! Locals:
 202    integer  :: cvdim
 203    integer  :: iSensor, iPredictor, instIndex
 204    integer  :: iChan
 205    integer  :: iPred, jPred, kPred, iScan1, iScan2
 206    character(len=85)  :: bcifFile
 207    character(len=10)  :: instrName, instrNamecoeff, satNamecoeff 
 208    logical            :: bcifExists
 209    ! variables from background coeff file
 210    integer            :: nfov, exitCode
 211    character(len=2)   :: predBCIF(tvs_maxchannelnumber,numpredictorsBCIF)
 212    integer            :: canBCIF(tvs_maxchannelnumber), npredBCIF(tvs_maxchannelnumber), ncanBcif, npredictors
 213    character(len=1)   :: bcmodeBCIF(tvs_maxchannelnumber), bctypeBCIF(tvs_maxchannelnumber)
 214    character(len=3)   :: global
 215    character(len=128) :: errorMessage
 216    real(8), allocatable :: Bmatrix(:,:)
 217
 218    call bcs_readConfig()
 219
 220    cvdim = 0
 221
 222    if (biasActive) then
 223
 224      if (scanBiasCorLength > 0.d0) call lfn_Setup('FifthOrder')
 225
 226      allocate(bias(tvs_nSensors))
 227
 228      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
 229
 230        write(*,*) "bcs_setup: iSensor = ", iSensor
 231       
 232        instrName = InstrNametoCoeffFileName(tvs_instrumentName(iSensor))
 233        instrNamecoeff = InstrNameinCoeffFile(tvs_instrumentName(iSensor))
 234        satNamecoeff = SatNameinCoeffFile(tvs_satelliteName(iSensor)) 
 235
 236        bcifFile = 'bcif_' // trim(instrName)
 237
 238        global = "XXX"
 239        nfov = -1
 240        do instIndex = 1, size(cinst)
 241          if (trim(instrNamecoeff) == trim(cinst(instIndex))) then
 242            global = cglobal(instIndex)
 243            nfov = nbscan(instIndex)
 244          end if
 245        end do
 246        if (nfov == -1) then
 247          write(*,*) "bcs_setup: Problem with instrName ", instrNamecoeff
 248          write(*,'(15(A10,1x))')  cinst(:)
 249          call utl_abort('bcs_setup: check nambiassat namelist')
 250        end if
 251
 252        inquire(file=trim(bcifFile), exist=bcifExists)
 253        if (bcifExists) then
 254          !read bcif (Bias Correction Information File)
 255          call read_bcif(bcifFile, tvs_isNameHyperSpectral(instrName), ncanBcif, &
 256               canBCIF, bcmodeBCIF, bctypeBCIF, npredBCIF, predBCIF, global, exitcode)
 257          if (exitcode /= 0) then
 258            call utl_abort("bcs_setup: Problem in read_bcif while reading " // trim(bcifFile))
 259          end if
 260
 261          bias(iSensor)%numChannels = ncanBcif
 262
 263          allocate(bias(iSensor)%chans(ncanBcif))
 264          
 265          do ichan=1, ncanBcif 
 266            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % channelNum = canBCIF(ichan + 1) 
 267            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeff_nobs = 0
 268            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % bcmode =  bcmodeBCIF(ichan + 1)
 269            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % bctype =  bctypeBCIF(ichan + 1)
 270            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % isDynamic = ( (biasmode == "varbc" .and. bcmodeBCIF(ichan + 1) == "D") .or. biasmode /= "varbc")
 271            npredictors =  1 + npredBCIF(ichan + 1)
 272            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % numActivePredictors = npredictors
 273
 274            allocate( bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % stddev( npredictors ) )
 275            allocate( bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeffIncr( npredictors ) )
 276            allocate( bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeff( npredictors ) )
 277            allocate( bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeff_offset( npredictors ) )
 278            allocate( bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % predictorIndex( npredictors ) )
 279            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % stddev(:) = 0.d0
 280            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeffIncr(:) = 0.d0
 281            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeff(:) = MPC_missingValue_R8
 282            bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeff_offset(:) = 0.d0
 283
 284            bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)% predictorIndex(1) = 1 !the constant term is always included
 285            jPred = 1
 286            do ipred = 1, npredBCIF(ichan + 1)
 287              jPred =  jPred + 1
 288              select case(predBCIF(ichan + 1, ipred))
 289              case('T1')
 290                kpred = 2
 291              case('T2')
 292                kpred = 3
 293              case('T3')
 294                kpred = 4
 295              case('T4')
 296                kpred = 5
 297              case('SV')
 298                kpred = 6
 299              case('TG')
 300                kpred = 7
 301              case default
 302                write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_setup: Unknown predictor ", predBCIF(ichan+1, ipred), ichan, ipred
 303                call utl_abort(errorMessage)
 304              end select
 305              bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%predictorIndex(jPred) = kpred
 306            end do
 307          end do
 308        else
 309          call utl_abort("bcs_setup: Error : " // trim(bcifFile) // " not present !")
 310        end if
 311
 312        bias(iSensor)%numscan = nfov 
 313
 314        allocate( bias(iSensor) % BHalfScanBias (nfov,nfov))
 315        if (doRegression) allocate( bias(iSensor) % BMinusHalfScanBias (nfov,nfov))
 316        allocate( Bmatrix(nfov,nfov))
 317        do ichan=1, ncanBcif
 318          allocate( bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeffIncr_fov(nfov))
 319          allocate( bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeff_fov(nfov))
 320          bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeffIncr_fov(:) = 0.d0
 321          bias(iSensor) % chans(ichan) % coeff_fov(:) = MPC_missingValue_R8
 322        end do
 323
 324        do ichan = 1, ncanBcif
 325          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%isDynamic) then
 326            do iPredictor = 1, bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%numActivePredictors
 327              bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%stddev(iPredictor) = bg_stddev(bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%PredictorIndex(iPredictor))
 328            end do
 329          end if
 330        end do
 331
 332        if (trim(biasMode) == "varbc") then
 333          !change dimension of control vector
 334          do  ichan = 1, ncanBcif
 335            if (bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%isDynamic) &
 336                 cvdim = cvdim + bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%numActivePredictors - 1 + bias(iSensor)%numScan
 337          end do
 338        end if
 339
 340        if (allocated(Bmatrix)) then
 341          if (scanBiasCorLength > 0.d0) then
 342            do iScan2 = 1, nfov
 343              do iScan1 = 1, nfov
 344                Bmatrix(iScan1,iScan2) = bg_stddev(1) * bg_stddev(1) * lfn_Response(1.d0*abs(iScan1-iScan2), scanBiasCorLength)
 345              end do
 346            end do
 347          else
 348            Bmatrix(:,:) = 0.d0
 349            do iScan1 = 1, nfov
 350              Bmatrix(iScan1,iScan1) = bg_stddev(1) * bg_stddev(1)
 351            end do
 352          end if
 353          bias(iSensor)%BHalfScanBias(:,:) =  Bmatrix(:,:)
 354          call utl_matsqrt(bias(iSensor)%BHalfScanBias, nfov, 1.d0, printInformation_opt=.true.)
 355          if (doRegression) then
 356            bias(iSensor)%BMinusHalfScanBias(:,:) = Bmatrix(:,:)
 357            call utl_matsqrt(bias(iSensor)%BMinusHalfScanBias, nfov, -1.d0, printInformation_opt=.true.)
 358          end if
 359          deallocate(Bmatrix)
 360        end if
 361
 362      end do
 363
 364    end if
 365
 366    if  (trim(biasMode) == "varbc" .and. cvdim > 0) then
 367      if (mmpi_myid > 0) cvdim = 0 ! for minimization, all coefficients only on task 0
 368      call cvm_setupSubVector('BIAS', 'BIAS', cvdim)
 369    end if
 370
 371    call  bcs_readCoeffs() ! Read coefficient files in the case of bias correction application (biasMode=="apply")
 372
 373  end subroutine bcs_setup
 374
 375  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 376  ! bcs_readCoeffs
 377  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 378  subroutine bcs_readCoeffs()
 379    !
 380    !:Purpose: Fill the bias structure with read static and dynamic bias correction coefficient files
 381    !
 382    implicit none
 383
 384    ! Locals:
 385    integer :: iSensor, iSat, jchannel, jChan
 386    integer :: satIndexDynamic, satIndexStatic
 387    integer :: chanindexDynamic, chanindexStatic
 388    character(len=10) :: instrName, instrNamecoeff, satNamecoeff
 389    character(len=64) :: dynamicCoeffFile, staticCoeffFile
 390    logical           :: corrected
 391    integer           :: nfov, npredictors
 392
 393    character(len=10) :: satsDynamic(tvs_nsensors)       ! satellite names
 394    integer           :: chansDynamic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber)    ! channel numbers
 395    real(8)           :: fovbiasDynamic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber,maxfov)! bias as F(fov)
 396    real(8)           :: coeffDynamic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber,NumPredictors + 1)
 397    integer           :: nsatDynamic
 398    integer           :: nchanDynamic(tvs_nsensors)      !number of channels
 399    integer           :: nfovDynamic
 400    integer           :: npredDynamic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber)    !number of predictors
 401    character(len=7)  :: cinstrumDynamic      ! string: instrument (e.g. AMSUB) 
 402    character(len=2)  :: ptypesDynamic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber,NumPredictors)
 403    integer           :: ndataDynamic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber)    !number of channels
 404
 405    character(len=10) :: satsStatic(tvs_nsensors)       ! satellite names
 406    integer           :: chansStatic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber)    !channel numbers 
 407    real(8)           :: fovbiasStatic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber,maxfov)!bias as F(fov)
 408    real(8)           :: coeffStatic(tvs_nsensors, tvs_maxchannelnumber,NumPredictors + 1)
 409    integer           :: nsatStatic
 410    integer           :: nchanStatic(tvs_nsensors)      !number of channels
 411    integer           :: nfovStatic
 412    integer           :: npredStatic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber)    ! number of predictors
 413    character(len=7)  :: cinstrumStatic      ! string: instrument (e.g. AMSUB) 9
 414    character(len=2)  :: ptypesStatic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber,NumPredictors)
 415    integer           :: ndataStatic(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxchannelnumber)    ! number of channels
 416
 417
 418    if (biasActive .and. biasMode == "apply") then
 419
 420      ! 1 fichier de coefficient par intrument avec les differentes plateformes
 421      ! Cas particulier GEORAD (CSR) 
 422      
 423      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
 424
 425        write(*,*) "bcs_readCoeffs: iSensor = ", iSensor
 426       
 427        instrName = InstrNametoCoeffFileName(tvs_instrumentName(iSensor))
 428        instrNamecoeff = InstrNameinCoeffFile(tvs_instrumentName(iSensor))
 429        satNamecoeff = SatNameinCoeffFile(tvs_satelliteName(iSensor)) 
 430
 431        dynamicCoeffFile = "coeff_file_" // trim(instrName)
 432        staticCoeffFile = "static_coeff_file_" // trim(instrName)
 433
 434        if ( tvs_isNameGeostationary(instrName)) then
 435          dynamicCoeffFile = trim(dynamicCoeffFile) // "." // trim(satNamecoeff)
 436          staticCoeffFile = trim(staticCoeffFile) // "." // trim(satNamecoeff) 
 437        end if
 438
 439        call read_coeff(satsDynamic, chansDynamic, fovbiasDynamic, coeffDynamic, nsatDynamic, nchanDynamic, nfovDynamic, &
 440             npredDynamic, cinstrumDynamic, dynamicCoeffFile, ptypesDynamic, ndataDynamic)
 441
 442        call read_coeff(satsStatic, chansStatic, fovbiasStatic, coeffStatic, nsatStatic, nchanStatic, nfovStatic, &
 443             npredStatic, cinstrumStatic, staticCoeffFile, ptypesStatic, ndataStatic)
 444        write(*,*) "bcs_readCoeffs: cinstrumDynamic = ", cinstrumDynamic
 445        write(*,*) "bcs_readCoeffs: cinstrumStatic = ", cinstrumStatic
 446
 447        satIndexDynamic = -1
 448        do iSat = 1, nsatDynamic
 449          if (trim(satNameCoeff) /= trim(satsDynamic(iSat)) .or. trim(instrNamecoeff) /= trim(cinstrumDynamic)) cycle
 450          satIndexDynamic = iSat
 451        end do
 452
 453        satIndexStatic = -1
 454        do iSat = 1, nsatStatic
 455          if (trim(satNameCoeff) /= trim(satsStatic(iSat)) .or. trim(instrNamecoeff) /= trim(cinstrumStatic)) cycle
 456          satIndexStatic = iSat
 457        end do
 458
 459        nfov =  bias(iSensor)%numscan
 460
 461        do jChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
 462
 463          chanindexDynamic = -1
 464          if (satIndexDynamic > 0) then
 465            do jChan = 1, nchanDynamic(satIndexDynamic)
 466              if (chansDynamic(satIndexDynamic,jChan) == bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%channelNum) then
 467                chanindexDynamic = jChan
 468                exit
 469              end if
 470            end do
 471          end if
 472
 473          chanindexStatic = -1
 474          if (satIndexStatic > 0) then
 475            do jChan = 1, nchanStatic(satIndexStatic)
 476              if (chansStatic(satIndexStatic,jChan) == bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%channelNum) then
 477                chanindexStatic = jChan
 478                exit
 479              end if
 480            end do
 481          end if
 482          npredictors = bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%numActivePredictors
 483       
 484          corrected = .true.
 485          select case(bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bcmode)
 486          case("D")
 487            if (chanindexDynamic > 0) then
 488              if (bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bctype=="C") &
 489                   bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%coeff(1:npredictors) = coeffDynamic(satIndexDynamic,chanindexDynamic,1:npredictors)
 490              if (bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bctype=="C" .or. bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bctype=="F") &
 491                   bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%coeff_fov(1:nfov) = fovbiasDynamic(satIndexDynamic,chanindexDynamic,1:nfov)
 492            else if (chanindexStatic > 0) then
 493              if (bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bctype=="C") &
 494                   bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%coeff(1:npredictors) = coeffStatic(satIndexStatic,chanindexStatic,1:npredictors)
 495              if (bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bctype=="C" .or. bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bctype=="F") &
 496                   bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%coeff_fov(1:nfov) = fovbiasStatic(satIndexStatic,chanindexStatic,1:nfov)
 497            else
 498              corrected = .false.
 499            end if
 500          case("S")
 501            if (chanindexStatic > 0) then
 502              if (bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bctype=="C") &
 503                   bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%coeff(1:npredictors) = coeffStatic(satIndexStatic,chanindexStatic,1:npredictors)
 504              if (bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bctype=="C" .or. bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%bctype=="F") & 
 505                   bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%coeff_fov(1:nfov) = fovbiasStatic(satIndexStatic,chanindexStatic,1:nfov)
 506            else
 507              corrected = .false.
 508            end if
 509          end select
 510          
 511          if (.not. corrected) then
 512            write(*,*) "bcs_readCoeffs: Warning: channel ", bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%channelNum, " of ", &
 513                 trim(instrName), " ", trim(satNamecoeff), " not corrected!"
 514          end if
 515
 516        end do
 517
 518      end do
 519        
 520    end if
 521
 522  end subroutine bcs_readCoeffs
 523
 524  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 525  ! bcs_computePredictorBiases
 526  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 527  subroutine bcs_computePredictorBiases(obsSpaceData)
 528    !
 529    !:Purpose: to compute predictor average
 530    !
 531    implicit none
 532
 533    ! Arguments:
 534    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsSpaceData
 535
 536    ! Locals:
 537    real(8) :: predictor(NumPredictors)
 538    integer :: iobs, nsize, i, j, npred
 539    integer :: headerIndex, idatyp, indxtovs
 540    integer :: iSensor, iFov, iPredictor, ierr
 541    integer :: bodyIndex, jpred, chanIndx
 542    real(8), allocatable ::  temp_offset(:,:)
 543    integer, allocatable ::  temp_nobs(:)
 544    real(8), allocatable ::  temp_offset2(:,:,:)
 545    integer, allocatable ::  temp_nobs2(:,:)
 546
 547    if (centerPredictors) then
 548      write(*,*) "bcs_computePredictorBiases: start"
 549      npred = 0
 550      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
 551        npred = max(npred, maxval(bias(iSensor)%chans(:)%numActivePredictors))
 552      end do
 553      allocate(temp_offset2(tvs_nsensors,maxval(bias(:)%numChannels),2:npred))
 554      allocate(temp_nobs2(tvs_nsensors,maxval(bias(:)%numChannels)))
 555      temp_offset2(:,:,:) = 0.d0
 556      temp_nobs2(:,:) = 0
 557
 558      call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
 559      iobs = 0
 560      HEADER: do
 561        headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
 562        if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER
 563
 564        ! process only radiance data to be assimilated?
 565        idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
 566        if (.not. tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
 567          write(*,*) 'bcs_computePredictorBiases: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
 568          cycle HEADER
 569        end if
 570        iobs = iobs + 1
 571        
 572        indxTovs = tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex)
 573        if (indxTovs < 0) cycle HEADER
 574
 575        iSensor = tvs_lsensor(indxTovs)
 576
 577        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
 578        iFov = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
 579
 580        BODY: do
 581          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
 582          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
 583
 584          if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY   
 585
 586          call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
 587          if (chanindx > 0) then
 588            call bcs_getPredictors(predictor, headerIndex, iobs, chanIndx, obsSpaceData)
 589            do iPredictor = 2, bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%NumActivePredictors
 590              jPred = bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%PredictorIndex(iPredictor)
 591              temp_offset2(iSensor,chanIndx,iPredictor) = temp_offset2(iSensor,chanIndx,iPredictor) + predictor(jPred)
 592            end do
 593            temp_nobs2(iSensor,chanIndx) = temp_nobs2(iSensor,chanIndx) + 1
 594          end if
 595        end do BODY
 596      end do HEADER
 597
 598      allocate(temp_offset(maxval(bias(:)%numChannels),2:npred))
 599      allocate(temp_nobs(maxval(bias(:)%numChannels)))
 600
 601      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors 
 602        temp_offset(:,:) = 0.0d0
 603        temp_offset(:,:) = temp_offset2(iSensor,:,:)
 604        call mmpi_allreduce_sumR8_2d( temp_offset, "GRID" )
 605
 606        do i = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
 607          do j = 2, bias(iSensor)%chans(i)%numActivePredictors
 608            bias(iSensor)%chans(i)%coeff_offset(j) = temp_offset(i,j)
 609          end do
 610        end do
 611
 612        temp_nobs(:) = 0
 613        nsize = size(temp_nobs)
 614        call rpn_comm_allreduce(temp_nobs2(iSensor,:), temp_nobs, nsize, "mpi_integer", &
 615             "mpi_sum", "GRID", ierr)
 616        if (ierr /= 0) then
 617          call utl_abort("bcs_computePredictorBiases: Erreur de communication MPI 2")
 618        end if
 619       
 620        do i = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
 621          bias(iSensor)%chans(i)%coeff_nobs = temp_nobs(i)
 622        end do
 623        do i = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
 624          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(i)%coeff_nobs > 0) then
 625            bias(iSensor)%chans(i)%coeff_offset(:) = bias(iSensor)%chans(i)%coeff_offset / bias(iSensor)%chans(i)%coeff_nobs
 626          end if
 627        end do
 628      end do
 629
 630      deallocate(temp_offset)
 631      deallocate(temp_nobs)
 632      deallocate(temp_offset2)
 633      deallocate(temp_nobs2)
 634
 635      write(*,*) "bcs_computePredictorBiases: end"
 636    end if
 637   
 638  end subroutine bcs_computePredictorBiases
 639
 640  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 641  ! bcs_calcBias
 642  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 643  subroutine bcs_calcBias(obsSpaceData, columnTrlOnTrlLev)
 644    !
 645    !:Purpose:  to fill OBS_BCOR column of ObsSpaceData body with bias correction computed from read coefficient file
 646    !
 647    implicit none
 648
 649    ! Arguments:
 650    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)        :: obsSpaceData
 651    type(struct_columnData), intent(inout) :: columnTrlOnTrlLev
 652
 653    ! Locals:
 654    integer  :: headerIndex, bodyIndex, iobs, indxtovs, idatyp
 655    integer  :: iSensor, iPredictor, chanIndx
 656    integer  :: iScan, iFov, jPred
 657    real(8)  :: predictor(NumPredictors)
 658    real(8)  :: biasCor
 659
 660    if (.not. biasActive) return
 661
 662    write(*,*) "bcs_calcBias: start"
 663
 664    if (.not. allocated(trialHeight300m1000)) then
 665      call bcs_getTrialPredictors(obsSpaceData, columnTrlOnTrlLev)
 666    end if
 667
 668    iobs = 0
 669    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
 670    HEADER: do
 671      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
 672      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER
 673
 674      ! process only radiance data to be assimilated?
 675      idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
 676      if (.not. tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
 677        write(*,*) 'bcs_calBias: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
 678        cycle HEADER
 679      end if
 680
 681      iobs = iobs + 1
 682      
 683      indxtovs = tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex)
 684      if (indxtovs < 0) cycle HEADER
 685
 686      iSensor = tvs_lsensor(indxTovs)
 687
 688      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
 689      iFov = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
 690
 691      if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 1) then
 692        iScan = iFov
 693      else
 694        iScan = 1
 695      end if
 696
 697      BODY: do
 698        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
 699        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
 700
 701        if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY   
 702        if (obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_VAR, bodyIndex) == MPC_missingValue_R8) cycle BODY
 703
 704        call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
 705        if (chanindx > 0) then
 706          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%isDynamic .and. bias(iSensor)%numScan >0) then
 707            if ( bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff_fov(iScan)/= MPC_missingValue_R8 .and. &
 708                 all( bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff(1:bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%NumActivePredictors)/= MPC_missingValue_R8) ) then
 709              biasCor = bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff_fov(iScan) + &
 710                   bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff(1)
 711              call bcs_getPredictors(predictor, headerIndex, iobs, chanIndx, obsSpaceData)
 712              do iPredictor = 2, bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%NumActivePredictors
 713                jPred = bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%PredictorIndex(iPredictor)
 714                biasCor = biasCor + predictor(jPred) * bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff(iPredictor)
 715              end do
 716              biasCor = -1.d0 * biascor
 717              call obs_bodySet_r( obsSpaceData, OBS_BCOR, bodyIndex, biasCor)
 718            end if
 719          end if
 720        end if
 721      end do BODY
 722    end do HEADER
 723
 724    write(*,*) "bcs_calcBias: end"
 725
 726  end subroutine bcs_calcBias
 727
 728  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 729  ! bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning
 730  !-----------------------------------------------------------------------
 731  subroutine bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning(obsSpaceData)
 732    !
 733    !:Purpose:  to dump bias correction coefficients and predictors in dedicated sqlite files 
 734    !
 735    implicit none
 736
 737    ! Arguments:
 738    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)     :: obsSpaceData
 739
 740    ! Locals:
 741    integer  :: headerIndex, bodyIndex,iobs, indxtovs, idatyp
 742    integer  :: sensorIndex, iPredictor, chanIndx, codeTypeIndex, fileIndex, searchIndex
 743    integer  :: iScan, iFov, jPred, burpChanIndex
 744    real(8)  :: predictor(NumPredictors)
 745    real(8)  :: biasCor
 746    real(8)  :: sunzen, sunaz, satzen, sataz
 747    type(fSQL_DATABASE), allocatable  :: db(:) ! SQLIte  file handle
 748    type(fSQL_STATEMENT), allocatable :: stmtPreds(:), stmtCoeffs(:) ! precompiled SQLite statements
 749    type(fSQL_STATUS)    :: stat                 ! SQLiteerror status
 750    character(len=512)   :: queryCreate, queryPreds, queryCoeffs, queryTrim
 751    logical, allocatable :: first(:)
 752    integer, allocatable :: fileIndexes(:), obsOffset(:),  dataOffset(:)
 753    character(len=*), parameter :: myName = 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning::'
 754    character(len=30)  :: fileNameExtension
 755    character(len=4)   :: cmyidx, cmyidy
 756    integer            :: tovsCodeTypeListSize, tovsCodeTypeList(ninst)
 757    integer            :: tovsFileNameListSize
 758    character(len=20)  :: tovsFileNameList(30)
 759    character(len=256) :: fileName
 760    integer :: tovsAllCodeTypeListSize, tovsAllCodeTypeList(ninst)
 761
 762    if (.not. biasActive) return
 763    if (.not. dumpToSqliteAfterThinning) return
 764
 765    write(*,*) "bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: start"
 766
 767    ! get list of all possible tovs codetype values and unique list of corresponding filenames
 768    call tvs_getAllIdBurpTovs(tovsAllCodeTypeListSize, tovsAllCodeTypeList)
 769    write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: tovsAllCodeTypeListSize = ', tovsAllCodeTypeListSize
 770    write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: tovsAllCodeTypeList = ', tovsAllCodeTypeList(1:tovsAllCodeTypeListSize)
 771    
 772    tovsFileNameListSize = 0
 773    tovsFileNameList(:) = 'XXXXX'
 774    do codeTypeIndex = 1, tovsAllCodeTypeListSize
 775      fileName = getObsFileName(tovsAllCodeTypeList(codeTypeIndex))
 776      if (all(tovsFileNameList(:) /= fileName)) then
 777        tovsFileNameListSize = tovsFileNameListSize + 1
 778        tovsFileNameList(tovsFileNameListSize) = fileName
 779      end if
 780    end do
 781    write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: tovsFileNameListSize = ', tovsFileNameListSize
 782    write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: tovsFileNameList = ', tovsFileNameList(1:tovsFileNameListSize)
 783    
 784    allocate(db(tovsFileNameListSize))
 785    allocate(stmtPreds(tovsFileNameListSize))
 786    allocate(stmtCoeffs(tovsFileNameListSize))
 787    allocate(first(tovsFileNameListSize))
 788    first(:) = .true.
 789    allocate(fileIndexes(size(obsf_cfilnam)))
 790    fileIndexes(:) = -1
 791    do fileIndex = 1, tovsFileNameListSize
 792      do searchIndex = 1, size(obsf_cfilnam)
 793        if (index(trim(obsf_cfilnam(searchIndex)), trim(tovsFileNameList(fileIndex))) >0) then
 794          fileIndexes(searchIndex) = fileIndex
 795        end if
 796      end do
 797    end do
 798    write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: fileIndexes', fileIndexes(1:tovsFileNameListSize)
 799    allocate(obsOffset(tovsFileNameListSize))
 800    allocate(dataOffset(tovsFileNameListSize))
 801    do fileIndex = 1, tovsFileNameListSize
 802      fileName = tovsFileNameList(fileIndex)
 803      write(*,*) 'tovs filename = ', fileName
 804      ! get list of codetypes associated with this filename
 805      tovsCodeTypeListSize = 0
 806      tovsCodeTypeList(:) = MPC_missingValue_INT
 807      do codeTypeIndex = 1, tovsAllCodeTypeListSize
 808        if (fileName == getObsFileName(tovsAllCodeTypeList(codeTypeIndex))) then
 809          tovsCodeTypeListSize = tovsCodeTypeListSize + 1
 810          tovsCodeTypeList(tovsCodeTypeListSize) = tovsAllCodeTypeList(codeTypeIndex)
 811        end if
 812      end do
 813      
 814      write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: tovsCodeTypeListSize = ', tovsCodeTypeListSize
 815      write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: tovsCodeTypeList = ', tovsCodeTypeList(1:tovsCodeTypeListSize) 
 816      call getInitialIdObsData(obsSpaceData, 'TO', obsOffset(fileIndex), dataOffset(fileIndex), &
 817           codeTypeList_opt=tovsCodeTypeList(1:tovsCodeTypeListSize))
 818      write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: obsOffset(fileIndex), dataOffset(fileIndex)', fileIndex, obsOffset(fileIndex), dataOffset(fileIndex) 
 819    end do
 820    
 821    iobs = 0
 822    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
 823    HEADER: do
 824      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
 825      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER
 826      ! process only radiance data to be assimilated?
 827      idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
 828      if (.not. tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
 829        write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
 830        cycle HEADER
 831      end if
 832      iobs = iobs + 1
 833      fileIndex = fileIndexes(obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_OTP, headerIndex))
 834      indxtovs = tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex)
 835      if (indxtovs < 0) cycle HEADER
 836      sensorIndex = tvs_lsensor(indxTovs)
 837      if (first(fileIndex)) then
 838        if (obs_mpiLocal(obsSpaceData)) then
 839          write(cmyidy,'(i4.4)') (mmpi_myidy + 1)
 840          write(cmyidx,'(i4.4)') (mmpi_myidx + 1)
 841          fileNameExtension = trim(cmyidx) // '_' // trim(cmyidy)
 842        else
 843          fileNameExtension = ' '
 844        end if
 845
 846        fileName = 'obs/bcr' // trim(tovsFileNameList(fileIndex)) &
 847             // '_' // trim(filenameExtension)
 848
 849        call fSQL_open(db(fileIndex), fileName, stat)
 850        write(*,*) 'bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: Open ', trim(fileName)
 851        if (fSQL_error(stat) /= FSQL_OK) call handleError(stat, 'fSQL_open: ')
 852
 853        ! Create the tables
 854        queryCreate = 'CREATE TABLE predictors(id_data integer, id_obs integer, predIndex integer, PredictorValue real,' // &
 855                      'PredictorType varchar(2), bcor real, fov integer, sunzen real, sunaz real, satzen real, sataz real);' // &
 856                      'CREATE TABLE  coeffs2(predIndex integer, coeff real, instrument varchar(10), platform varchar(16), vcoord integer, fov integer);'
 857        call fSQL_do_many(db(fileIndex), queryCreate, stat)
 858        if (fSQL_error(stat) /= FSQL_OK) call handleError(stat, 'fSQL_do_many: ')
 859
 860        queryPreds = 'insert into predictors (id_data, id_obs, predIndex, predictorValue,' // &
 861                     ' predictorType, bcor, fov, sunzen, sunaz, satzen, sataz) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?);'
 862        queryCoeffs = 'insert into coeffs2 (predIndex, coeff, instrument, platform, vcoord, fov) values(?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?); '
 863        write(*,*) myName // ' Insert query Predictors   = ', trim(queryPreds)
 864        write(*,*) myName // ' Insert query Coeffs = ', trim(queryCoeffs)
 865        call fSQL_begin(db(fileIndex))
 866        call fSQL_prepare(db(fileIndex), queryPreds, stmtPreds(fileIndex), stat)
 867        if (fSQL_error(stat) /= FSQL_OK) call handleError(stat, 'fSQL_prepare 1: ')
 868        call fSQL_prepare(db(fileIndex), queryCoeffs, stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), stat)
 869        if (fSQL_error(stat) /= FSQL_OK) call handleError(stat, 'fSQL_prepare 2: ')
 870        first(fileIndex) = .false.
 871      end if
 872      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
 873      iFov = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
 874      sunzen = obs_headElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_SUN, headerIndex)
 875      sunaz = obs_headElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_SAZ, headerIndex)
 876      satzen = obs_headElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_SZA, headerIndex)
 877      sataz = obs_headElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_AZA, headerIndex)
 878      if (bias(sensorIndex)%numScan > 1) then
 879        iScan = iFov
 880      else
 881        iScan = 1
 882      end if
 883      BODY: do
 884        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
 885        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
 886        if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY   
 887        if (obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_VAR, bodyIndex) == MPC_missingValue_R8) cycle BODY
 888        if (btest(obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex), 11)) cycle BODY 
 889        call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, sensorIndex, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
 890        if (chanindx > 0) then
 891          biasCor = 0.0d0
 892          if (bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%isDynamic .and. bias(sensorIndex)%numScan > 0) then
 893            call bcs_getPredictors(predictor, headerIndex, iobs, chanIndx, obsSpaceData)
 894            biasCor = bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff_fov(iScan) + &
 895                 bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff(1) 
 896            burpChanIndex = nint(obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_PPP, bodyIndex))                   
 897            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=1, int_var=0)
 898            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=2, real8_var=bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff_fov(iScan))
 899            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=3, char_var=trim(tvs_instrumentName(sensorIndex)))
 900            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=4, char_var=trim(tvs_satelliteName(sensorIndex)))
 901            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=5, int_var=burpChanIndex)
 902            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=6, int_var=iScan)
 903            call fSQL_exec_stmt(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex))
 904            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=1, int_var=1)
 905            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=2, real8_var=bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff(1))
 906            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=3, char_var=trim(tvs_instrumentName(sensorIndex)))
 907            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=4, char_var=trim(tvs_satelliteName(sensorIndex)))
 908            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=5, int_var=burpChanIndex)
 909            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=6, int_var=iScan)
 910            call fSQL_exec_stmt(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex))
 911            do iPredictor = 2, bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%NumActivePredictors
 912              jPred = bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%PredictorIndex(iPredictor)
 913              biasCor = biasCor + predictor(jPred) * bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff(iPredictor)
 914            end do
 915          end if
 916          biasCor = -1.d0 * biascor
 917          do iPredictor = 2, bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%NumActivePredictors
 918            jPred = bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%PredictorIndex(iPredictor)
 919            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=1, int_var=jPred)
 920            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=2, real8_var=bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff(iPredictor))
 921            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=3, char_var=trim(tvs_instrumentName(sensorIndex)))
 922            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=4, char_var=trim(tvs_satelliteName(sensorIndex)))
 923            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=5, int_var=burpChanIndex)
 924            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex), param_index=6, int_var=iScan)
 925            call fSQL_exec_stmt (stmtCoeffs(fileIndex))
 926            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=1, int_var=bodyIndex + dataOffset(fileIndex))
 927            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=2, int_var=headerIndex + obsOffset(fileIndex))
 928            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=3, int_var=jPred)
 929            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=4, real8_var=predictor(jPred))
 930            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=5, char_var=predtab(jPred))
 931            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=6, real8_var=biascor)
 932            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=7, int_var=iScan)
 933            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=8, real8_var=sunzen)
 934            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=9, real8_var=sunaz )
 935            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=10, real8_var=satzen )
 936            call fSQL_bind_param(stmtPreds(fileIndex), param_index=11, real8_var=sataz)
 937            call fSQL_exec_stmt (stmtPreds(fileIndex))
 938          end do
 939        end if
 940      end do BODY
 941    end do HEADER
 942    do fileIndex = 1, tovsFileNameListSize
 943      if (.not. first(fileIndex)) then
 944        call fSQL_finalize(stmtCoeffs(fileIndex))
 945        call fSQL_finalize(stmtPreds(fileIndex))
 946        queryTrim = 'create table coeffs as select distinct * from coeffs2; drop table coeffs2;'
 947        call fSQL_do_many(db(fileIndex), queryTrim, stat)
 948        if (fSQL_error(stat) /= FSQL_OK) call handleError(stat, 'fSQL_do_many: ')
 949        call fSQL_commit(db(fileIndex), stat)
 950        if (fSQL_error(stat) /= FSQL_OK) call handleError(stat, 'fSQL_commit: ')
 951        call fSQL_close(db(fileIndex), stat)
 952        if (fSQL_error(stat) /= FSQL_OK) call handleError(stat, 'fSQL_close: ')
 953      end if
 954    end do
 955    deallocate(dataOffset)
 956    deallocate(obsOffset)
 957    deallocate(fileIndexes)
 958    deallocate(first)
 959    deallocate(stmtCoeffs)
 960    deallocate(stmtPreds)
 961    deallocate(db)
 962    write(*,*) "bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning: end"
 963  contains
 964
 965    subroutine handleError(stat, message)
 966      implicit none
 967      type(FSQL_STATUS), intent(in)  :: stat
 968      character(len=*), intent(in) :: message
 969
 970      write(*,*) message, fSQL_errmsg(stat)
 971      call utl_abort(trim(message))
 972    end subroutine handleError
 973
 974  end subroutine bcs_dumpBiasToSqliteAfterThinning
 975
 976  !---------------------------------------
 977  ! bcs_computeResidualsStatistics
 978  !----------------------------------------
 979  subroutine bcs_computeResidualsStatistics(obsSpaceData, prefix)
 980    !
 981    !:Purpose: to compute residuals mean and standard deviation by intrument, channel and scan position
 982    !
 983    implicit none
 984
 985    ! Arguments:
 986    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)  :: obsSpaceData
 987    character(len=*), intent(in)     :: prefix
 988
 989    ! Locals:
 990    real(8), allocatable :: tbias(:,:), tstd(:,:)
 991    integer, allocatable :: tcount(:,:)
 992    real(8), allocatable :: biasMpiGlobal(:,:), stdMpiGLobal(:,:)
 993    integer, allocatable :: countMpiGlobal(:,:)
 994    integer :: sensorIndex, headerIndex, bodyIndex
 995    integer :: nchans, nscan
 996    integer :: iSensor, iScan, chanIndx, iFov
 997    real(8) :: OmF, bcor
 998    integer :: ierr, nulfile1, nulfile2
 999    character(len=10) :: instrName, satNamecoeff
1000    character(len=72) :: errorMessage
1001
1002    if (.not. biasActive) return
1003
1004    if (.not. outstats) return
1005
1006    write(*,*) "bcs_computeResidualsStatistics: start"
1007
1008    SENSORS:do sensorIndex = 1, tvs_nsensors
1009
1010      if  (.not. tvs_isReallyPresentMpiGLobal(sensorIndex)) cycle SENSORS
1011
1012      write(*,*) "bcs_computeResidualsStatistics: sensorIndex ", sensorIndex
1013
1014      nchans = bias(sensorIndex)%numChannels
1015      nscan = bias(sensorIndex)%numscan
1016     
1017      allocate(tbias(nchans,nscan))
1018      tbias(:,:) = 0.d0
1019      allocate(tstd(nchans,nscan))
1020      tstd(:,:) = 0.d0
1021      allocate(tcount(nchans,nscan))
1022      tcount(:,:) = 0
1023
1024      call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
1025
1026      HEADER: do
1027        headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
1028        if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER
1029        if (tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex) < 0) cycle HEADER
1030        iSensor = tvs_lsensor(tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex))
1031        if (iSensor /= sensorIndex) cycle HEADER
1032          
1033        iFov = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
1034        if (nscan > 1) then
1035          iScan = iFov
1036        else
1037          iScan = 1
1038        end if
1039
1040        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
1041        BODY: do
1042          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
1043          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
1044          
1045          if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY 
1046          call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
1047          if (chanindx > 0) then
1048            OmF = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OMP, bodyIndex)
1049            bcor =  obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_BCOR, bodyIndex)
1050            if (OmF /= MPC_missingValue_R8 .and. bcor /= MPC_missingValue_R8) then
1051              tbias(chanIndx,iScan) = tbias(chanIndx,iScan) + (OmF + bcor)
1052              tstd(chanIndx,iScan) = tstd(chanIndx,iScan) + (OmF + bcor) ** 2
1053              tcount(chanIndx,iScan) = tcount(chanIndx,iScan) + 1
1054            end if
1055          end if
1056        end do BODY
1057      end do HEADER
1058
1059      allocate( biasMpiGlobal(nchans,nscan) )
1060      allocate( stdMpiGlobal(nchans,nscan) )
1061      allocate( countMpiGlobal(nchans,nscan) )
1062
1063      call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_2d( tbias, biasMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
1064      call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_2d( tstd, stdMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
1065      call rpn_comm_reduce(tcount, countMpiGlobal, size(countMpiGlobal), "mpi_integer", "MPI_SUM", 0, "GRID", ierr)
1066      if (ierr /=0) then
1067        write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_computeResidualsStatistics: MPI communication error 3", ierr 
1068        call utl_abort(errorMessage)
1069      end if
1070
1071      if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
1072        where(countMpiGlobal > 0) 
1073          biasMpiGlobal = biasMpiGlobal / countMpiGlobal
1074          stdMpiGlobal = sqrt(stdMpiGlobal/ countMpiGlobal  - biasMpiGlobal**2)
1075        end where
1076      
1077        instrName = InstrNametoCoeffFileName(tvs_instrumentName(sensorIndex))
1078        satNamecoeff = SatNameinCoeffFile(tvs_satelliteName(sensorIndex)) 
1079
1080        nulfile1 = 0
1081        ierr = fnom(nulfile1, './std_' // trim(instrName) // '_' // trim(satNamecoeff) // trim(prefix) // '.dat', 'FTN+FMT', 0)
1082        nulfile2 = 0
1083        ierr = fnom(nulfile2, './mean_' // trim(instrName) // '_' // trim(satNamecoeff) // trim(prefix) // '.dat', 'FTN+FMT', 0)
1084
1085        do chanIndx = 1, nchans
1086          if (sum(countMpiGlobal(chanIndx, :)) > 0) then
1087            write(nulfile2,'(i4,1x,100e14.6)') chanIndx, biasMpiGlobal(chanindx,:)
1088            write(nulfile1,'(i4,1x,100e14.6)') chanIndx, stdMpiGlobal(chanindx,:)
1089          end if
1090        end do
1091        ierr = fclos(nulfile1)
1092        ierr = fclos(nulfile2)
1093       
1094      end if
1095
1096      deallocate(biasMpiGlobal)
1097      deallocate(stdMpiGlobal)
1098      deallocate(countMpiGlobal)
1099      deallocate(tbias)
1100      deallocate(tstd)
1101      deallocate(tcount)
1102 
1103    end do SENSORS
1104
1105    write(*,*) "bcs_computeResidualsStatistics: end"
1106    
1107  end subroutine bcs_computeResidualsStatistics
1108
1109  !---------------------------------------
1110  !  bcs_removeOutliers
1111  !---------------------------------------- 
1112  subroutine  bcs_removeOutliers(obsSpaceData)
1113    !
1114    !:Purpose: to remove outliers (too large OmF) from linear regression
1115    !
1116    implicit none
1117
1118    ! Arguments:
1119    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)  :: obsSpaceData
1120
1121    ! Locals:
1122    real(8), allocatable :: tbias(:,:), tstd(:,:)
1123    integer, allocatable :: tcount(:,:)
1124    real(8), allocatable :: biasMpiGlobal(:,:), stdMpiGLobal(:,:)
1125    integer, allocatable :: countMpiGlobal(:,:)
1126    integer :: sensorIndex, headerIndex, bodyIndex
1127    integer :: nchans, nfiles
1128    integer :: iSensor, chanIndx, timeIndex
1129    real(8) :: OmF
1130    real(8), parameter :: alpha = 5.d0
1131    real(8) :: stepObsIndex
1132    integer :: ierr
1133    character(len=72) :: errorMessage
1134
1135    if (.not. biasActive) return
1136
1137    write(*,*) "bcs_removeOutliers: start"
1138
1139    SENSORS:do sensorIndex = 1, tvs_nsensors
1140
1141      if  (.not. tvs_isReallyPresentMpiGLobal(sensorIndex)) cycle SENSORS
1142
1143      write(*,*) "bcs_removeOutliers: sensorIndex ", sensorIndex
1144
1145      nchans = bias(sensorIndex)%numChannels
1146      nfiles = tim_nstepobs
1147     
1148      allocate(tbias(nchans,nfiles))
1149      tbias(:,:) = 0.d0
1150      allocate(tstd(nchans,nfiles))
1151      tstd(:,:) = 0.d0
1152      allocate(tcount(nchans,nfiles))
1153      tcount(:,:) = 0
1154
1155      call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
1156
1157      HEADER1: do
1158        headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
1159        if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
1160        if (tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex) < 0) cycle HEADER1
1161        iSensor = tvs_lsensor(tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex))
1162        if (iSensor /= sensorIndex) cycle HEADER1
1163
1164        call tim_getStepObsIndex(stepObsIndex, tim_getDatestamp(), &
1165             obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_DAT, headerIndex), &
1166             obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ETM, headerIndex), tim_nstepobs)
1167
1168        timeIndex = nint(stepObsIndex)
1169        if  (timeIndex < 0) cycle HEADER1
1170        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
1171        BODY1: do
1172          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
1173          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY1
1174          
1175          if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) == obs_assimilated .and. &
1176               .not. btest(obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex), 6)) then 
1177            call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
1178            if (chanindx > 0) then
1179              OmF = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OMP, bodyIndex)
1180              if (OmF /= MPC_missingValue_R8) then
1181                tbias(chanIndx,timeindex) = tbias(chanIndx,timeindex) + OmF
1182                tstd(chanIndx,timeindex) = tstd(chanIndx,timeindex) + (OmF ** 2)
1183                tcount(chanIndx,timeindex) =  tcount(chanIndx,timeindex) + 1
1184              end if
1185            end if
1186          end if
1187        end do BODY1
1188      end do HEADER1
1189
1190      allocate(biasMpiGlobal(nchans,nfiles))
1191      allocate(stdMpiGlobal(nchans,nfiles))
1192      allocate(countMpiGlobal(nchans,nfiles))
1193
1194      call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_2d( tbias, biasMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
1195      call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_2d( tstd, stdMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
1196      call rpn_comm_reduce(tcount, countMpiGlobal, size(countMpiGlobal), "mpi_integer", "MPI_SUM", 0, "GRID", ierr)
1197      if (ierr /=0) then
1198        write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_removeOutliers: MPI communication error 3", ierr 
1199        call utl_abort(errorMessage)
1200      end if
1201
1202      if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
1203        where(countMpiGlobal > 0) 
1204          biasMpiGlobal = biasMpiGlobal / countMpiGlobal
1205          stdMpiGlobal = sqrt(stdMpiGlobal/ countMpiGlobal  - biasMpiGlobal**2)
1206        end where
1207      end if
1208
1209      call rpn_comm_bcast(countMpiGlobal, nchans*nfiles, "mpi_integer", 0, "GRID", ierr)
1210      if (ierr /=0) then
1211        write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_removeOutliers: MPI communication error 4", ierr 
1212        call utl_abort(errorMessage)
1213      end if
1214      call rpn_comm_bcast(stdMpiGlobal, nchans*nfiles, "mpi_double_precision", 0, "GRID", ierr)
1215      if (ierr /=0) then
1216        write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_removeOutliers: MPI communication error 5", ierr 
1217        call utl_abort(errorMessage)
1218      end if
1219
1220      if (sum(countMpiGlobal) /= 0) then
1221
1222        tcount(:,:) = 0
1223
1224        call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
1225
1226        HEADER2: do
1227          headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
1228          if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER2
1229          if (tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex) < 0) cycle HEADER2
1230          iSensor = tvs_lsensor(tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex))
1231          if (iSensor /= sensorIndex) cycle HEADER2
1232
1233          call tim_getStepObsIndex(stepObsIndex, tim_getDatestamp(), &
1234               obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_DAT, headerIndex), &
1235               obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ETM, headerIndex), tim_nstepobs)
1236
1237          timeIndex = nint(stepObsIndex)
1238          if  (timeIndex < 0) cycle HEADER2
1239          
1240          call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
1241          BODY2: do
1242            bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
1243            if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
1244          
1245            if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) == obs_assimilated .and. &
1246                 .not. btest(obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex), 6)) then 
1247
1248              call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
1249
1250              if (chanindx > 0) then
1251             
1252                OmF = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OMP, bodyIndex)
1253                if (countMpiGlobal(chanIndx, timeindex) > 2 .and.  &
1254                     abs(OmF) > alpha * stdMpiGlobal(chanIndx, timeindex)) then
1255                  call obs_bodySet_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex, obs_notAssimilated)
1256                  tcount(chanIndx,timeindex) = tcount(chanIndx,timeindex) + 1
1257                end if
1258             
1259              end if
1260            end if
1261          end do BODY2
1262        end do HEADER2
1263
1264        do chanIndx = 1, nchans
1265          if (sum(tcount(chanIndx,:)) > 0) then
1266            write(*,'(A,1x,i2,1x,i4,1x,i6,1x,30e14.6)') "bcs_removeOutliers:", sensorindex, chanIndx, sum(tcount(chanIndx,:)), stdMpiGlobal(chanIndx,:)
1267          end if
1268        end do
1269
1270      end if
1271
1272      deallocate(biasMpiGlobal)
1273      deallocate(stdMpiGlobal)
1274      deallocate(countMpiGlobal)
1275      deallocate(tbias)
1276      deallocate(tstd)
1277      deallocate(tcount)
1278
1279    end do SENSORS
1280
1281    write(*,*) "bcs_removeOutliers: end"
1282
1283  end subroutine bcs_removeOutliers
1284
1285  !---------------------------------------
1286  ! bcs_calcBias_tl
1287  !---------------------------------------- 
1288  subroutine bcs_calcBias_tl(cv_in, obsColumnIndex, obsSpaceData, columnTrlOnTrlLev)
1289    !
1290    !:Purpose: tl of bias computation (for varBC)
1291    !
1292    implicit none
1293
1294    ! Arguments:
1295    real(8), intent(in)                    :: cv_in(:)
1296    integer, intent(in)                    :: obsColumnIndex
1297    type(struct_obs),  intent(inout)       :: obsSpaceData
1298    type(struct_columnData), intent(inout) :: columnTrlOnTrlLev
1299
1300    ! Locals:
1301    integer  :: headerIndex, bodyIndex, iobs, indxtovs, idatyp
1302    integer  :: iSensor, iPredictor, chanIndx
1303    integer  :: iScan, iFov, jPred
1304    real(8)  :: predictor(NumPredictors)
1305    real(8), pointer :: cv_bias(:)
1306    real(8), target  :: dummy4Pointer(1)
1307    real(8)  :: biasCor
1308
1309    if (.not. biasActive) return
1310
1311    if (.not. allocated(trialHeight300m1000)) then
1312      call bcs_getTrialPredictors(obsSpaceData, columnTrlOnTrlLev)
1313      call bcs_computePredictorBiases(obsSpaceData)
1314      call bcs_getRadiosondeWeight(obsSpaceData, lmodify_obserror_opt=.true.)
1315    end if
1316
1317    nullify(cv_bias)
1318    if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
1319      if (cvm_subVectorExists('BIAS')) then
1320        cv_Bias => cvm_getSubVector(cv_in, 'BIAS')
1321        write(*,*) 'bcs_calcBias_tl: maxval(cv_bias) = ', maxval(cv_bias(:))
1322      else
1323        write(*,*) 'bcs_calcBias_tl: control vector does not include bias coefficients'
1324        return
1325      end if
1326   else
1327      cv_bias => dummy4Pointer
1328   end if
1329
1330    ! get bias coefficients
1331    call bcs_cvToCoeff(cv_bias)
1332
1333    ! apply bias increment to specified obs column
1334    iobs = 0
1335    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
1336    HEADER: do
1337      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
1338      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER
1339
1340      ! process only radiance data to be assimilated?
1341      idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
1342      if (.not. tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
1343        write(*,*) 'bcs_calBias_tl: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
1344        cycle HEADER
1345      end if
1346      
1347      iobs = iobs + 1
1348
1349      indxtovs = tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex)
1350      if (indxtovs < 0) cycle HEADER
1351
1352      iSensor = tvs_lsensor(indxTovs)
1353
1354      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
1355      iFov = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
1356
1357      BODY: do
1358        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
1359        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
1360
1361        if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY   
1362
1363        call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
1364
1365        if (chanindx > 0) then
1366          biasCor = 0.0d0
1367          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%isDynamic .and. bias(iSensor)%numScan >0) then
1368            call bcs_getPredictors(predictor, headerIndex, iobs, chanindx, obsSpaceData)
1369            do iPredictor = 1, bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%NumActivePredictors
1370              jPred = bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%PredictorIndex(iPredictor)
1371              if (iPredictor == 1) then
1372                if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 1) then
1373                  iScan = iFov
1374                else
1375                  iScan = 1
1376                end if
1377                biasCor = biasCor + predictor(jPred) * bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeffIncr_fov(iScan) 
1378              else
1379                biasCor = biasCor + predictor(jPred) * bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeffIncr(iPredictor) 
1380              end if
1381            end do
1382          end if
1383          call obs_bodySet_r(obsSpaceData, obsColumnIndex, bodyIndex, &
1384               obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, obsColumnIndex, bodyIndex) - biasCor)
1385        end if
1386      end do BODY
1387    end do HEADER
1388
1389
1390  end subroutine bcs_calcBias_tl
1391 
1392  !----------------------
1393  ! bcs_getTrialPredictors
1394  !----------------------
1395  subroutine bcs_getTrialPredictors(obsSpaceData, columnTrlOnTrlLev)
1396    !
1397    !:Purpose: get predictors from trial fields
1398    !
1399    implicit none
1400
1401    ! Arguments:
1402    type(struct_columnData), intent(inout) :: columnTrlOnTrlLev
1403    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)        :: obsSpaceData
1404
1405    ! Locals:
1406    integer  :: headerIndex, idatyp, iobs
1407    real(8)  :: height1, height2
1408
1409    if (tvs_nobtov > 0) then
1410      allocate(trialHeight300m1000(tvs_nobtov))
1411      allocate(trialHeight50m200(tvs_nobtov))
1412      allocate(trialHeight5m50(tvs_nobtov))
1413      allocate(trialHeight1m10(tvs_nobtov))
1414      allocate(trialTG(tvs_nobtov))
1415      allocate(RadiosondeWeight(tvs_nobtov))
1416    else
1417      write(*,*) 'bcs_getTrialPredictors: No radiance OBS found'
1418      return
1419    end if
1420    
1421    iobs = 0
1422
1423    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
1424
1425    HEADER2: do
1426      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
1427      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER2
1428      idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
1429      if (.not.  tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
1430        write(*,*) 'bcs_getTrialPredictors: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
1431        cycle HEADER2
1432      end if
1433      iobs = iobs + 1
1434
1435      height1 = logInterpHeight(columnTrlOnTrlLev, headerIndex, 1000.d0)
1436      height2 = logInterpHeight(columnTrlOnTrlLev, headerIndex, 300.d0)
1437      
1438      trialHeight300m1000(iobs) = height2 - height1
1439
1440      height1 = logInterpHeight(columnTrlOnTrlLev, headerIndex, 200.d0)
1441      height2 = logInterpHeight(columnTrlOnTrlLev, headerIndex, 50.d0)
1442
1443      trialHeight50m200(iobs) = height2 - height1
1444
1445      height1 = height2
1446      height2 = logInterpHeight(columnTrlOnTrlLev, headerIndex, 5.d0)
1447
1448      trialHeight5m50(iobs) = height2 - height1
1449
1450      height1 = logInterpHeight(columnTrlOnTrlLev, headerIndex, 10.d0)
1451      height2 = logInterpHeight(columnTrlOnTrlLev, headerIndex, 1.d0)
1452
1453      trialHeight1m10(iobs) = height2 - height1
1454
1455      trialTG(iobs) = col_getElem(columnTrlOnTrlLev, 1, headerIndex, 'TG')
1456
1457    end do HEADER2
1458
1459    if (trialTG(1) > 150.0d0) then
1460      write(*,*) 'bcs_getTrialPredictors: converting TG from Kelvin to deg_C'
1461      trialTG(:) = trialTG(:) - MPC_K_C_DEGREE_OFFSET_R8
1462    end if
1463
1464    trialHeight300m1000(:) = 0.1d0 * trialHeight300m1000(:) ! conversion factor
1465    trialHeight50m200(:) = 0.1d0 * trialHeight50m200(:)
1466    trialHeight5m50(:) = 0.1d0 * trialHeight5m50(:)
1467    trialHeight1m10(:) =  0.1d0 *  trialHeight1m10(:)
1468
1469    write(*,*) 'bcs_getTrialPredictors: end'
1470
1471  contains
1472
1473    function logInterpHeight(columnTrlOnTrlLev, headerIndex, p) result(height)
1474      !Arguments:
1475      type(struct_columnData), intent(inout) :: columnTrlOnTrlLev
1476      integer, intent(in) :: headerIndex
1477      real(8), intent(in) :: p
1478      real(8) :: height
1479      !Locals
1480      integer :: jk, nlev, ik
1481      real(8) :: zpt, zpb, zwt, zwb
1482      real(8), pointer :: col_ptr(:)
1483
1484      ik = 1
1485      nlev = col_getNumLev(columnTrlOnTrlLev, 'TH')
1486      do jk = 2, nlev - 1
1487        zpt = col_getPressure(columnTrlOnTrlLev, jk, headerIndex, 'TH') * MPC_MBAR_PER_PA_R8
1488        if(p > zpt) ik = jk
1489      end do
1490      zpt = col_getPressure(columnTrlOnTrlLev, ik, headerIndex, 'TH') * MPC_MBAR_PER_PA_R8
1491      zpb = col_getPressure(columnTrlOnTrlLev, ik + 1, headerIndex, 'TH') * MPC_MBAR_PER_PA_R8
1492
1493      zwb = log(p/zpt) / log(zpb/zpt)
1494      zwt = 1.d0 - zwb
1495      col_ptr => col_getColumn(columnTrlOnTrlLev, headerIndex, 'Z_T')
1496
1497      height = zwb * col_ptr(ik+1) + zwt * col_ptr(ik)
1498   
1499    end function logInterpHeight
1500
1501  end subroutine bcs_getTrialPredictors
1502
1503  !----------------------
1504  ! bcs_cvToCoeff
1505  !----------------------
1506  subroutine bcs_cvToCoeff(cv_bias)
1507    !
1508    !:Purpose: get coefficient increment from control vector
1509    !
1510    implicit none
1511
1512    ! Arguments:
1513    real(8)  :: cv_bias(:)
1514
1515    ! Locals:
1516    integer  :: index_cv, iSensor, iChannel, iPredictor, iScan
1517    integer  :: nsize, ierr
1518 
1519    if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
1520      write(*,*) 'bcs_cvToCoeff: start'
1521      index_cv = 0
1522      ! initialize of coeffIncr
1523      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1524        if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1525          do iChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1526            if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%isDynamic) then
1527              bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(:) = 0.0d0
1528              bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov(:) = 0.0d0
1529            end if
1530          end do
1531        end if
1532      end do
1533
1534      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1535        if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1536          do iChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1537            if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%isDynamic) then
1538              do iPredictor = 1, bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%numActivePredictors
1539                if (iPredictor == 1) then
1540                  do iScan = 1, bias(iSensor)%numScan
1541                    index_cv = index_cv + 1
1542                    bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov(iScan) = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%stddev(iPredictor) * cv_bias(index_cv)
1543                  end do
1544                else
1545                  index_cv = index_cv + 1
1546                  bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(iPredictor) = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%stddev(iPredictor) * cv_bias(index_cv)
1547                end if
1548              end do !iPredictor
1549            end if ! isDynamic
1550          end do !iChannel
1551        end if
1552      end do !iSensor
1553
1554    end if
1555    
1556    ! for constant part
1557    do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1558      if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1559        nsize = bias(iSensor)%numScan 
1560        do iChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1561          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%isDynamic) &
1562               call rpn_comm_bcast(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov, nsize, "mpi_double_precision", 0, "GRID", ierr)
1563        end do
1564      end if
1565    end do
1566
1567    ! for predictor part
1568    do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1569      if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1570        do iChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1571          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%isDynamic) then
1572            nsize = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%numActivePredictors 
1573            call rpn_comm_bcast(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr, nsize, "mpi_double_precision", 0, "GRID", ierr)
1574          end if
1575        end do
1576      end if
1577    end do
1578
1579  end subroutine bcs_cvToCoeff
1580
1581  !-----------------------------------
1582  ! bcs_getPredictors
1583  !---------------------------------- 
1584   subroutine bcs_getPredictors(predictor, headerIndex, obsIndex, chanindx, obsSpaceData)
1585     !
1586     !:Purpose: get predictors
1587     !
1588    implicit none
1589
1590    ! Arguments:
1591    real(8), intent(out)            :: predictor(NumPredictors)
1592    integer, intent(in)             :: headerIndex, obsIndex, chanindx
1593    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsSpaceData
1594
1595    ! Locals:
1596    integer  :: iSensor, iPredictor, jPredictor
1597    real(8)  :: zenithAngle
1598
1599    predictor(:) = 0.0d0
1600    
1601    do iPredictor = 1, NumPredictors
1602
1603      if (iPredictor == 1) then
1604        ! constant
1605        predictor(iPredictor) = 1.0d0
1606      else if (iPredictor == 2) then
1607        ! Height300-Height1000 (dam) /1000 T1
1608        predictor(iPredictor) = trialHeight300m1000(obsIndex) / 1000.0d0
1609      else if (iPredictor == 3) then
1610        ! Height50-Height200 (dam) /1000   T2
1611        predictor(iPredictor) = trialHeight50m200(obsIndex) / 1000.0d0
1612      else if (iPredictor == 4) then
1613        ! Height5-Height50 (dam) /1000    T3
1614        predictor(iPredictor) = trialHeight5m50(obsIndex) / 1000.0d0
1615      else if (iPredictor == 5) then
1616        ! Height1-Height10 (dam) /1000    T4
1617        predictor(iPredictor) = trialHeight1m10(obsIndex) / 1000.0d0        
1618      else if (iPredictor == 6) then
1619        ! SV secant of satellite zenith angle minus one
1620        zenithAngle = obs_headElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_SZA, headerIndex) 
1621        if (zenithAngle < 75.) predictor(iPredictor) = (1.d0 / cos(zenithAngle * MPC_RADIANS_PER_DEGREE_R8)) - 1.d0
1622      else if (iPredictor == 7) then
1623        ! skin temperature (C) /10
1624        predictor(iPredictor) = trialTG(obsIndex)
1625      end if
1626
1627    end do
1628
1629    iSensor = tvs_lsensor(tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex))
1630    do  iPredictor = 1, bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%numActivePredictors
1631      jPredictor = bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%predictorIndex(iPredictor)
1632      predictor(jPredictor) = predictor(jPredictor) - bias(iSensor)%chans(chanindx)%coeff_offset(iPredictor)
1633    end do
1634   
1635  end subroutine bcs_getPredictors
1636
1637  !---------------------------------------------
1638  ! bcs_calcBias_ad
1639  !---------------------------------------------
1640  subroutine bcs_calcBias_ad(cv_out, obsColumnIndex, obsSpaceData)
1641    !
1642    !:Purpose: bias computation adjoint (for varBC)
1643    !
1644    implicit none
1645
1646    ! Arguments:
1647    real(8), intent(in)  :: cv_out(:)
1648    integer, intent(in)  :: obsColumnIndex
1649    type(struct_obs)     :: obsSpaceData
1650
1651    ! Locals:
1652    integer  :: headerIndex, bodyIndex, iobs, idatyp
1653    integer  :: iSensor, iChannel, iPredictor, chanIndx
1654    integer  :: iScan, iFOV, jPred
1655    real(8)  :: predictor(NumPredictors)
1656    real(8), pointer  :: cv_bias(:)
1657    real(8), target  :: dummy4Pointer(1)
1658    real(8)  :: biasCor
1659
1660    if (.not. biasActive) return
1661
1662    if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,*) 'bcs_calcBias_ad: start'
1663
1664    nullify(cv_bias)
1665    if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
1666      if (cvm_subVectorExists('BIAS')) then
1667        cv_bias => cvm_getSubVector(cv_out, 'BIAS')
1668      else
1669        write(*,*) 'bcs_calcBias_ad: control vector does not include bias coefficients'
1670        return
1671      end if
1672    else
1673      cv_bias => dummy4Pointer
1674    end if
1675
1676    ! adjoint of applying bias increment to specified obs column
1677    do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1678      if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1679        do iChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1680          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%isDynamic) then
1681            bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(:) = 0.0d0
1682            bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov(:) = 0.0d0
1683          end if
1684        end do
1685      end if
1686    end do
1687
1688    iobs = 0
1689    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
1690    HEADER: do
1691      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
1692      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER
1693      idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
1694      if (.not.  tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
1695        write(*,*) 'bcs_calcBias_ad: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
1696        cycle HEADER
1697      end if
1698      iobs = iobs + 1
1699      if (tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex) < 0) cycle HEADER
1700
1701      iSensor = tvs_lsensor(tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex))
1702
1703      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
1704      iFov = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
1705
1706      BODY: do
1707        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
1708        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
1709
1710        if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY
1711
1712        call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
1713
1714        if (chanindx > 0) then
1715          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%isDynamic) then
1716            call bcs_getPredictors(predictor, headerIndex, iobs, chanIndx, obsSpaceData)
1717            biasCor = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, obsColumnIndex, bodyIndex)
1718            do iPredictor = 1, bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%numActivePredictors
1719              jPred = bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%PredictorIndex(iPredictor)
1720              if (jPred == 1) then
1721                if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 1) then
1722                  iScan = iFov
1723                else
1724                  iScan = 1
1725                end if
1726                bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeffIncr_fov(iScan) = bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeffIncr_fov(iScan) &
1727                     + predictor(jPred) * biasCor
1728              else
1729                bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeffIncr(iPredictor) = bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%coeffIncr(iPredictor) & 
1730                     + predictor(jPred) * biasCor
1731              end if
1732            end do !iPredictor
1733          end if
1734        end if
1735
1736      end do BODY
1737
1738    end do HEADER
1739
1740    ! put the coefficients into the control vector
1741    call bcs_cvToCoeff_ad(cv_bias)
1742
1743    if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
1744      write(*,*) 'bcs_calcBias_ad: maxval(cv_bias) = ', maxval(cv_bias(:))
1745    end if
1746
1747  end subroutine bcs_calcBias_ad
1748
1749  !----------------------------------------------------
1750  ! bcs_cvToCoeff_ad
1751  !----------------------------------------------------
1752  subroutine bcs_cvToCoeff_ad(cv_bias)
1753    !
1754    !:Purpose: adjoint of control vector to coeff transfer (for varBC)
1755    !
1756    implicit none
1757
1758    ! Arguments:
1759    real(8), intent(inout)  :: cv_bias(:)
1760
1761    ! Locals:
1762    integer  :: index_cv, iSensor, iChannel, iPredictor, iScan
1763    integer  :: nChan, nScan
1764    integer  :: nsize, iChan
1765    real(8), allocatable  :: temp_coeffIncr(:), temp_coeffIncr_fov(:)
1766
1767    write(*,*) "bcs_cvToCoeff_ad: start"
1768
1769    do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1770      if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1771        nChan = bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1772        do ichan = 1, nChan
1773          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%isDynamic) then
1774            nSize = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChan)%numActivePredictors
1775            allocate(temp_coeffIncr(nSize))
1776            temp_coeffIncr(:) = 0.0d0
1777            call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_1d( bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%coeffIncr(:), temp_coeffIncr, 0, "GRID" )
1778            bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%coeffIncr(:) = temp_coeffIncr(:)
1779            deallocate(temp_coeffIncr)
1780          end if
1781        end do
1782      end if
1783    end do
1784
1785    do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1786      if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1787        nChan = bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1788        nScan = bias(iSensor)%numScan
1789        nsize = nChan * nScan
1790        if (nsize > 0) then
