1791          allocate(temp_coeffIncr_fov(1:nScan))
1792          do ichan = 1, nChan
1793            if (bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%isDynamic) then
1794              temp_coeffIncr_fov(:) = 0.0d0
1795              call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_1d( bias(iSensor)%chans(ichan)%coeffIncr_fov, temp_coeffIncr_fov, 0, "GRID" )
1796              bias(iSensor)%chans(iChan)%coeffIncr_fov(:) = temp_coeffIncr_fov(:)
1797            end if
1798          end do
1799          deallocate(temp_coeffIncr_fov)
1800        end if
1801      end if
1802    end do
1803
1804    if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
1805      cv_bias(:) = 0.d0
1806      index_cv = 0
1807      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1808        if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1809          do iChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1810            if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%isDynamic) then
1811              do iPredictor = 1, bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%numActivePredictors
1812                if (iPredictor == 1) then
1813                  do iScan = 1, bias(iSensor)%numScan
1814                    index_cv = index_cv + 1
1815                    cv_bias(index_cv) = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%stddev(iPredictor) * bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov(iScan)
1816                  end do
1817                else
1818                  index_cv = index_cv + 1
1819                  cv_bias(index_cv) = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%stddev(iPredictor) * bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(iPredictor)
1820                end if
1821              end do
1822            end if
1823          end do
1824        end if
1825      end do
1826    end if
1827    
1828  end subroutine bcs_cvToCoeff_ad
1829
1830  !-----------------------------------------
1831  ! bcs_writeBias
1832  !-----------------------------------------
1833  subroutine bcs_writeBias(cv_in)
1834    !
1835    !:Purpose: to write bias increments and coefficients (varBC)
1836    !
1837    implicit none
1838
1839    ! Arguments:
1840    real(8), optional, intent(in)  :: cv_in(:)
1841
1842    ! Locals:
1843    integer  :: iSensor, iChannel, iPredictor, iScan
1844    integer  :: jSensor, iChannel2
1845    integer  :: nulfile_inc, nulfile_fov, ierr
1846    real(8), pointer :: cv_bias(:)
1847    real(8), target  :: dummy4Pointer(1)
1848    character(len=80) :: BgFileName
1849    !for background coeff and write out
1850    integer             :: iInstr
1851    integer             :: numCoefFile, jCoef, kCoef
1852    character(len=10)   :: coefInstrName(tvs_nSensors), temp_instrName
1853    character(len=25)   :: filecoeff
1854    logical             :: coeffExists
1855    ! these variables are not used but need to be present to satisfy bcs_updateCoeff interface
1856    ! some bcs_updateCoeff arguments could be made optional (todo)
1857    integer            :: chans(tvs_nSensors, tvs_maxChannelNumber), nsat, nfov
1858    integer            :: nchan(tvs_nSensors)
1859    character(len=10)  :: sats(tvs_nsensors) ! satellite names
1860    character(len=7)   :: cinstrum           ! string: instrument (e.g. AMSUB)
1861
1862    if (.not. biasActive) return
1863
1864    if (present(cv_in)) then
1865      nullify(cv_bias)
1866      if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
1867        if (cvm_subVectorExists('BIAS')) then
1868          cv_bias => cvm_getSubVector(cv_in, 'BIAS')
1869          write(*,*) 'bcs_writeBias: maxval(cv_bias) = ', maxval(cv_bias(:))
1870        else
1871          write(*,*) 'bcs_writeBias: control vector does not include bias coefficients'
1872          return
1873        end if
1874      else
1875        cv_bias => dummy4Pointer
1876      end if
1877      call bcs_cvToCoeff(cv_bias)
1878    end if
1879
1880    ! apply transformation to account for predictor offset
1881
1882    do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1883      if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1884        do iChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1885          do iPredictor = 2, bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%numActivePredictors
1886            if (mimicSatbcor) then
1887              bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(1) = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(1) - &
1888                   bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(iPredictor) * bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeff_offset(iPredictor)
1889            else
1890              do iScan = 1, bias(iSensor)%numScan
1891                bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov(iScan) = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov(iScan) - &
1892                     bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(iPredictor) * bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeff_offset(iPredictor)
1893              end do
1894            end if
1895          end do
1896          if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%numActivePredictors > 0 .and. mmpi_myId ==0 .and. (.not. doRegression)) &
1897               write(*,*) "bcs_writeBias: bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(:) = ",  bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(:)
1898        end do
1899      end if
1900    end do
1901
1902    if (doRegression) then
1903      call bcs_writeCoeff()
1904      return
1905    end if
1906
1907    if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
1908
1909      ! write out bias coefficient increments in ascii file
1910      nulfile_inc = 0
1911      ierr = fnom(nulfile_inc, './satbias_increment.dat', 'FTN+FMT', 0)
1912
1913      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1914        write(nulfile_inc,'(/,1X,"Sensor Index=",I3,", Satellite Name=",A15,", Instrument Name=",A15)') &
1915             iSensor, tvs_satelliteName(iSensor), tvs_instrumentName(iSensor)
1916        if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1917          do iChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1918            if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%isDynamic) then
1919              iChannel2 = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%channelNum
1920              if (sum(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(:)) /= 0.0d0) &
1921                   write(nulfile_inc,'(3X,"Channel number=",I4)') iChannel2
1922              do iPredictor = 2, bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%numActivePredictors
1923                if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(iPredictor) /= 0.0d0) &
1924                     write(nulfile_inc,'(5X,"Predictor number=",I4,", Coefficient=",e12.4)') &
1925                     iPredictor, bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr(iPredictor)
1926              end do
1927            end if
1928          end do
1929        end if
1930      end do
1931
1932      ierr = fclos(nulfile_inc)
1933
1934      ! write out fovbias coefficient increments in ascii file
1935      nulfile_fov = 0
1936      ierr = fnom(nulfile_fov, './fovbias_incre.dat', 'FTN+FMT', 0)
1937      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1938        write(nulfile_fov,'(/,1X,"Sensor Index=",I3,", Satellite Name=",A15,", Instrument Name=",A15)') &
1939             iSensor, tvs_satelliteName(iSensor), tvs_instrumentName(iSensor)
1940        if (bias(iSensor)%numScan > 0) then
1941          do iChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
1942            if (bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%isDynamic) then
1943              iChannel2 = bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%channelNum
1944              if (sum(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov(:)) /= 0.0d0) then
1945                write(nulfile_fov,'(3X,"Channel number=",I4)') iChannel2 
1946                write(nulfile_fov,*) bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov(:)
1947              end if
1948            end if
1949          end do
1950        end if
1951      end do
1952      ierr = fclos(nulfile_fov)
1953
1954    end if
1955
1956    ! Find the background coeff_file number and name
1957    do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1958      numCoefFile = 0
1959      jCoef = 0
1960      do jSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
1961        temp_instrName = InstrNametoCoeffFileName(tvs_instrumentName(jSensor))
1962        filecoeff = 'coeff_file_' // trim(temp_instrName) // ''
1963        inquire(file=trim(filecoeff), exist=coeffExists)
1964
1965        if (coeffExists) then
1966          numCoefFile = numCoefFile + 1
1967          jCoef = jCoef + 1
1968          coefInstrName(jCoef) = temp_instrName
1969        end if
1970        if (jSensor > 1) then
1971          do kCoef = 1, jCoef - 1
1972            if (temp_instrName == coefInstrName(kCoef)) then
1973              numCoefFile = numCoefFile - 1
1974              jCoef = jCoef - 1
1975            end if
1976          end do
1977        end if 
1978      end do
1979    end do
1980
1981    ! update coeff_file_instrument and write out
1982    do iInstr=1, numCoefFile 
1983      BgFileName = './coeff_file_' // coefInstrName(iInstr)
1984      call bcs_updateCoeff(tvs_nSensors, NumPredictors, BgFileName, sats, chans, nsat, nchan, nfov, cinstrum)
1985    end do
1986
1987  end subroutine bcs_writeBias
1988
1989  !-----------------------------------------
1990  ! bcs_updateCoeff
1991  !-----------------------------------------
1992  subroutine bcs_updateCoeff(maxsat, maxpred, coeff_file, sats, chans, nsat, nchan, nfov, cinstrum, updateCoeff_opt)
1993    !
1994    !:Purpose: to read, and optionaly update and write out, the coeff files (varBC).
1995    !
1996    implicit none
1997
1998    ! Arguments:
1999    integer, intent(in)           :: maxsat, maxpred
2000    character(len=*), intent(in)  :: coeff_file
2001    logical, optional, intent(in) :: updateCoeff_opt
2002    integer, intent(out)          :: chans(maxsat,tvs_maxChannelNumber)       ! channel numbers
2003    integer, intent(out)          :: nsat, nfov
2004    integer, intent(out)          :: nchan(maxsat)  ! number of channels
2005    character(len=10), intent(out):: sats(maxsat) ! Satellite names
2006    character(len=*), intent(out) :: cinstrum     ! instrument (e.g. AMSUB)
2007
2008    ! Locals:
2009    real(8)            :: fovbias(maxsat,tvs_maxChannelNumber,maxfov)
2010    real(8)            :: coeff(maxsat,tvs_maxChannelNumber,maxpred)
2011    character(len=2) :: ptypes(maxsat,tvs_maxChannelNumber,maxpred) 
2012    integer            :: npred(maxsat,tvs_maxChannelNumber)           ! number of predictors
2013    integer            :: ndata(maxsat,tvs_maxChannelNumber)
2014    ! LOCAL for reading background coeff file
2015    integer            :: iSat, jChan, kPred, kFov
2016    logical            :: verbose
2017    ! update coeff files
2018    real               :: fovbias_an(maxsat,tvs_maxChannelNumber,maxfov)
2019    real               :: coeff_an(maxsat,tvs_maxChannelNumber,maxpred) 
2020    integer            :: iSensor, jChannel, iFov, iPred, totPred
2021    character(len=10)  :: tmp_SatName, tmp_InstName 
2022    ! write out files 
2023    integer            :: iuncoef2, ierr, numPred
2024    character(len=80):: filename2
2025    logical            :: updateCoeff_opt2
2026    !   sats(nsat)            = satellite names
2027    !   chans(nsat, nchan(i))  = channel numbers of each channel of each satellite i
2028    !   npred(nsat, nchan(i))  = number of predictors for each channel of each satellite i
2029    !   fovbias(i, j, k)        = bias for satellite i, channel j, FOV k   k=1,nfov
2030    !     if FOV not considered for instrument, nfov = 1 and fovbias is global bias for channel
2031    !   coeff(i, j, 1)          = regression constant
2032    !   coeff(i, j, 2), ..., coeff(i, j, npred(i, j)) = predictor coefficients
2033    !   nsat, nchan, nfov, cinstrum (output) are determined from file
2034    !   if returned nsat = 0, coeff_file was empty
2035    !   maxpred (input) is max number of predictors
2036    !   maxsat (input)  is max number of satellites
2037    ! There are three parts in this subroutine, read, update and write out the coeff files
2038    ! 
2039    !- 1. read in the background coeff files, this program is read_coeff from genbiascorr
2040    ! 
2041    if (present(updateCoeff_opt)) then
2042      updateCoeff_opt2 = updateCoeff_opt
2043    else
2044      updateCoeff_opt2 = .true.
2045    end if
2046
2047    verbose = .false.
2048   
2049    call read_coeff(sats, chans, fovbias, coeff, nsat, nchan, nfov, &
2050         npred, cinstrum, coeff_file, ptypes, ndata)
2051
2052    ! Transfer of coefficients read from file to the bias structure
2053    satloop :do iSat = 1, nsat  !backgroud sat
2054      instloop:do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
2055        ! for Satellite Name
2056        tmp_SatName = SatNameinCoeffFile(tvs_satelliteName(iSensor))
2057        ! for Instrument Name
2058        tmp_InstName = InstrNameinCoeffFile(tvs_instrumentName(iSensor))
2059        
2060        if (trim(tmp_SatName) /= trim(sats(iSat)) .or. trim(tmp_InstName) /= trim(cinstrum)) cycle instloop
2061        write(*,*) "bcs_updateCoeff: " // tmp_SatName // " " // tmp_InstName
2062
2063        if (.not. allocated(bias(iSensor)%chans)) cycle instloop
2064
2065        chan1loop:do jChan = 1, nchan(iSat)
2066          chan2loop:do jChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels  
2067
2068            if (chans(iSat, jChan) /= bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%channelNum) cycle chan2loop
2069
2070            ! part 1 for coeffIncr
2071            do iFov = 1, nfov
2072              bias(iSensor)%chans(jchannel)%coeff_fov(iFov) = fovbias(iSat, jChan, iFov)
2073            end do ! iFov
2074            
2075            ! part 2 for coeffIncr_fov
2076            totPred  = bias(iSensor)%chans(jchannel)%NumActivePredictors 
2077            do iPred = 1, totPred
2078              bias(iSensor)%chans(jchannel)%coeff(iPred) = coeff(iSat, jChan, iPred)
2079            end do ! iPred
2080            
2081          end do chan2loop ! jChannel
2082        end do chan1loop !jChan
2083        
2084      end do instloop
2085    end do satloop
2086    
2087    if (.not. updateCoeff_opt2) return 
2088    
2089    !
2090    !- 2.update coeff and fovbias  
2091    !
2092    coeff_an(:,:,:) = coeff(:,:,:)
2093    fovbias_an(:,:,:) = fovbias(:,:,:)
2094
2095    do iSat = 1, nsat  !backgroud sat
2096      do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
2097        ! for Satellite Name
2098        tmp_SatName = SatNameinCoeffFile(tvs_satelliteName(iSensor))
2099        ! for Instrument Name
2100        tmp_InstName = InstrNameinCoeffFile(tvs_instrumentName(iSensor))
2101        if (trim(tmp_SatName) /= trim(sats(iSat)) .or. trim(tmp_InstName) /= trim(cinstrum)) cycle 
2102        do jChan = 1, nchan(iSat)
2103          do jChannel = 1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels  
2104
2105            if (chans(iSat, jChan) /= bias(iSensor)%chans(jChannel)%channelNum) cycle
2106
2107            ! part 1 for coeffIncr
2108            do iFov = 1, nfov
2109              fovbias_an(iSat, jChan, iFov) = fovbias(iSat, jChan, iFov) + bias(iSensor)%chans(jchannel)%coeffIncr_fov(iFov)
2110            end do ! iFov
2111
2112            ! part 2 for coeffIncr_fov
2113            totPred  = bias(iSensor)%chans(jchannel)%NumActivePredictors 
2114            do iPred = 1, totPred
2115              coeff_an(iSat, jChan, iPred) = coeff(iSat, jChan, iPred) + bias(iSensor)%chans(jchannel)%coeffIncr(iPred)
2116            end do ! iPred
2117
2118          end do ! jChannel
2119        end do !jChan
2120      end do !iSensor
2121    end do ! iSat
2122
2123    !
2124    !- 3. Write out updated_coeff
2125    ! 
2126
2127    if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
2128
2129      iuncoef2 = 0
2130      filename2 = './anlcoeffs_' // cinstrum 
2131      ierr = fnom(iuncoef2, filename2, 'FTN+FMT', 0)
2132
2133      write(*,*) 'bcs_updateCoeff: write in bcs_updateCoeff'
2134   
2135      do iSat = 1, nsat
2136        do jChan = 1, nchan(iSat)
2137          numPred = npred(iSat, jChan)
2138          if (sum(abs(coeff_an(iSat, jchan, 1:numpred+1))) /= 0.d0 .and. sum(abs(fovbias_an(iSat, jChan, 1:nfov))) /= 0.d0) then 
2139            write(iuncoef2,'(A52,A8,1X,A7,1X,I6,1X,I8,1X,I2,1X,I3)') &
2140                 'SATELLITE, INSTRUMENT, CHANNEL, NOBS, NPRED, NSCAN: ', sats(iSat), cinstrum, chans(iSat,jChan), ndata(isat,jchan), numPred, nfov
2141            write(iuncoef2,'(A7,6(1X,A2))') 'PTYPES:', (ptypes(iSat, jChan, kPred), kPred = 1, numPred)
2142            write(iuncoef2,'(120(1x,ES17.10))') (fovbias_an(iSat, jChan, kFov), kFov = 1, nfov)
2143            write(iuncoef2,*) (coeff_an(iSat, jChan, kPred), kPred = 1, numPred + 1)
2144          end if
2145        end do
2146      end do
2147
2148      ierr = fclos(iuncoef2) 
2149   
2150      write(*,*) 'bcs_updateCoeff: finish writing coeffient file', filename2
2151    
2152    end if
2153
2154  end subroutine bcs_updateCoeff
2155
2156  !-----------------------------------------
2157  ! bcs_writeCoeff
2158  !-----------------------------------------
2159  subroutine bcs_writeCoeff()
2160    !
2161    !:Purpose:  write out  the coeff files (regression case).
2162    !
2163    implicit none
2164
2165    ! Locals:
2166    integer            :: iuncoef, numPred, ierr
2167    character(len=80)  :: filename
2168    character(len=80)  :: instrName, satNamecoeff
2169    integer :: sensorIndex, nchans, nscan, nfov, kpred, kFov, jChan
2170
2171    if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
2172
2173      SENSORS:do sensorIndex = 1, tvs_nsensors
2174
2175        if  (.not. tvs_isReallyPresentMpiGLobal(sensorIndex)) cycle SENSORS
2176
2177        write(*,*) "bcs_writeCoeff: sensorIndex ", sensorIndex
2178
2179        nchans = bias(sensorIndex)%numChannels
2180        nscan = bias(sensorIndex)%numscan
2181
2182        instrName = InstrNameinCoeffFile(tvs_instrumentName(sensorIndex))
2183        satNamecoeff = SatNameinCoeffFile(tvs_satelliteName(sensorIndex)) 
2184
2185        filename = './anlcoeffs_' // trim(instrName)  
2186        call utl_open_asciifile(filename, iuncoef)
2187        nfov = bias(sensorIndex)%numScan
2188        do jChan = 1, nchans
2189          if (bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%coeff_nobs > 0) then
2190            numPred = bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%numActivePredictors 
2191          
2192            write(iuncoef,'(A52,A8,1X,A7,1X,I6,1X,I8,1X,I2,1X,I3)') 'SATELLITE, INSTRUMENT, CHANNEL, NOBS, NPRED, NSCAN: ',  &
2193                 satNameCoeff, instrName, bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%channelNum, bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%coeff_nobs, numPred - 1, nfov
2194            write(iuncoef,'(A7,6(1X,A2))') 'PTYPES:',  (predtab(bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%predictorIndex(kPred)), kPred = 2, numPred)
2195            write(iuncoef,'(120(1x,ES17.10))') (bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%coeff_fov(kFov), kFov = 1, nfov)
2196            write(iuncoef,'(12(1x,ES17.10))') (bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%coeff(kPred), kPred = 1, numPred)
2197          end if
2198        end do
2199
2200        ierr = fclos(iuncoef) 
2201
2202        if (outCoeffCov) then
2203          filename = './anlcoeffsCov_' // trim(instrName)  
2204          call utl_open_asciifile(filename, iuncoef)
2205          do jChan = 1, nchans
2206            if (bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%coeff_nobs > 0) then
2207              numPred = bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%numActivePredictors 
2208          
2209              write(iuncoef,'(A38,A8,1X,A7,1X,I6,1X,I2)') 'SATELLITE, INSTRUMENT, CHANNEL, NPRED: ',  &
2210                   satNameCoeff, instrName, bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%channelNum, numPred
2211              do kpred =1, numPred
2212                write(iuncoef,'(10e14.6)') bias(sensorIndex)%chans(jChan)%coeffCov(kpred, :)
2213              end do
2214            end if
2215          end do
2216          ierr = fclos(iuncoef) 
2217        end if
2218
2219      end do SENSORS
2220
2221    end if
2222
2223 end subroutine bcs_writeCoeff
2224
2225 !-----------------------------------------
2226 ! bcs_removeBiasCorrection
2227 !-----------------------------------------
2228 subroutine bcs_removeBiasCorrection(obsSpaceData, family_opt)
2229    !
2230    !:Purpose: to remove bias correction from OBS_VAR
2231    !           After the call OBS_VAR contains the uncorrected
2232    !           observation and OBS_BCOR is set to zero
2233    !
2234    implicit none
2235
2236    ! Arguments:
2237    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)        :: obsSpaceData
2238    character(len=2), intent(in), optional :: family_opt
2239
2240    ! Locals:
2241    integer :: nbcor
2242    integer :: bodyIndex
2243    real(8) :: biascor, Obs
2244
2245    if (.not. removeBiasCorrection) return
2246
2247    if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,*) 'bcs_removeBiasCorrection: start'
2248
2249    nbcor = 0
2250    call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, family_opt)
2251    
2252    BODY: do
2253      bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
2254      if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
2255      if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY  
2256      biasCor = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_BCOR, bodyIndex)
2257      Obs = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_VAR, bodyIndex)
2258      if (biasCor /= MPC_missingValue_R8 .and. Obs /= MPC_missingValue_R8) then
2259        call obs_bodySet_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_VAR, bodyIndex, real(Obs - biasCor, pre_obsReal))
2260        call obs_bodySet_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_BCOR, bodyIndex, real(0.d0, pre_obsReal))
2261        nbcor = nbcor + 1
2262      end if
2263    end do BODY
2264
2265    if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
2266      write(*,*) 'bcs_removeBiasCorrection: removed bias correction for ', nbcor, ' observations'
2267      write(*,*) 'bcs_removeBiasCorrection exiting'
2268    end if
2269
2270  end subroutine bcs_removeBiasCorrection
2271
2272  !-----------------------------------------
2273  ! bcs_filterObs
2274  !-----------------------------------------
2275  subroutine bcs_filterObs(obsSpaceData)
2276    !
2277    !:Purpose: to filter radiance observations to include into
2278    !           bias correction offline computation
2279    !           (same rules as in bgck.gen_table)
2280    !
2281    implicit none
2282
2283    ! Arguments:
2284    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsSpaceData
2285
2286    ! Locals:
2287    integer :: bodyIndex, headerIndex
2288    integer :: assim, flag, codtyp, channelNumber
2289    integer :: isatBufr, instBufr, iplatform, isat, inst, idsat, i, chanIndx
2290    logical :: lHyperIr, lGeo, lSsmis, lTovs
2291    logical :: condition, condition1, condition2, channelIsAllsky
2292
2293    if (.not. filterObs) return
2294
2295    if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,*) 'bcs_filterObs: start'
2296
2297    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
2298    HEADER: do
2299      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
2300      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER
2301
2302      codtyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
2303
2304      lHyperIr = .false.
2305      lGeo = .false.
2306      lSsmis = .false.
2307      lTovs = .false.
2308
2309      select case (codtyp_get_name(codtyp))
2310      case("ssmis")
2311        lSsmis = .true.
2312      case("csr")
2313        lGeo = .true.
2314      case("airs","iasi","cris","crisfsr")
2315        lHyperIr = .true.
2316      case default
2317        lTovs = .true.
2318      end select
2319
2320      isatBufr = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_SAT, headerIndex) !BUFR element 1007
2321      instBufr = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_INS, headerIndex) !BUFR element 2019
2322
2323      call tvs_mapSat(isatBufr, iplatform, isat)
2324      call tvs_mapInstrum(instBufr, inst)
2325
2326      idsat = -1
2327      do i = 1, tvs_nsensors
2328         if (tvs_platforms(i) == iplatform .and.  &
2329             tvs_satellites(i) == isat     .and.  &
2330             tvs_instruments(i) == inst)     then
2331          idsat = i
2332          exit
2333        end if
2334      end do
2335      if (idsat == -1) cycle HEADER
2336
2337      call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
2338
2339      BODY: do
2340        bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
2341        if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
2342
2343        ! determine if instrument/channel function in all-sky mode
2344        channelNumber = nint(obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_PPP, bodyIndex))
2345        channelIsAllsky = .false.
2346        if ((tvs_isInstrumUsingCLW(tvs_instruments(idsat)) .or. &
2347             tvs_isInstrumUsingHydrometeors(tvs_instruments(idsat))) .and. &
2348            oer_useStateDepSigmaObs(channelNumber, idsat)) then
2349          channelIsAllsky = .true.
2350        end if
2351
2352        assim = obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex)
2353
2354        if (assim == obs_notAssimilated) then
2355          call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, idsat, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
2356          if (chanIndx > 0) then
2357            flag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
2358
2359            if (lSsmis) then   ! SSM/I and SSMIS
2360              !   Here "good" means data that are not rejected by first QC program satqc_ssmi(s) (bit 7 ON).
2361              !   Bit 11 is ON for data that are unselected by UTIL or for uncorrected data (or both).
2362              !   Data rejected by first QC program satqc_ssmi(s) have bit 7 switched ON only (in addition to bit 9) as
2363              !   rogue/topo checks are skipped. So if bit 16 (rogue) is ON, bit 7 must be off.
2364              if (.not. offlineMode) then
2365                if (allModeSsmis) then
2366                  !  FLAG test: all good data (corrected/selected or not) that have passed all QC (bit 9 OFF)
2367                  condition1 = .not. btest(flag, 9) !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 0)'
2368                  !  FLAG test: uncorrected good data that failed rogue check only ([bit 9 ON] + bit 6 OFF + bit 16 ON + bit 18 OFF + [bit 7 OFF])
2369                  condition2 = .not. btest(flag, 6) .and. btest(flag, 16) .and. .not. btest(flag, 18) !' AND (FLAG & 64 = 0) AND (FLAG &  65536 = 65536) AND (FLAG & 262144 = 0)'
2370                  condition = condition1 .or. condition2
2371                else
2372                  !  FLAG test: corrected/selected good data that have passed QC (bits 9,11 OFF) --> data to be assimilated
2373                  condition = .not. btest(flag, 9) .and. .not. btest(flag, 11)       !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 0) AND (FLAG & 2048 = 0)'
2374                end if
2375              else   ! OFFLINE MODE --> want all observations except data rejected for any reason other than rogue innovation check
2376                condition1 = .not. btest(flag, 9) !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 0)'  
2377                ! all good data that passed all QC    
2378                ! "good" data that failed rogue check [bit 9 ON, bit 7 OFF, bit 18 OFF]
2379                condition2 = btest(flag, 9) .and. .not. btest(flag, 7) .and. .not. btest(flag, 18) !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 512) AND (FLAG & 128 = 0) AND (FLAG & 262144 = 0)'
2380                condition = condition1 .or. condition2
2381              end if
2382            else if(lTovs) then
2383              ! AMSU-A, AMSU-B/MHS, ATMS, MWHS-2
2384              !  In AMSU case, bit 11 is set for data that are not bias corrected or for unselected channels.
2385              !    BUT unlike other instruments, all AMSU data are bias corrected, whether selected or not
2386              !    so bit 11 = unselected channel (like bit 8 for AIRS/IASI)
2387              !  Bit 9 is set for all other rejections including rogue (9+16) and topography (9+18).
2388              !  In addition, bit 7 is set for channels with bad data or data that should not be assimilated.
2389              if (.not. offlineMode) then
2390                if (allModeTovs) then
2391                  !  FLAG test: all data (selected or not) that have passed QC (bit 9 OFF)
2392                  condition1 = .not. btest(flag, 9) !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 0)'
2393                  !  FLAG test: uncorrected (bit 6 OFF) data that failed rogue check only (bit (9)/16 ON, 18,7 OFF)
2394                  !             NOTE: As all AMSU data are normally bias corrected, query2 will return nothing
2395                  condition2 = btest(flag, 16) .and. .not. btest(flag, 6) .and. .not. btest(flag, 18) .and. .not. btest(flag, 7)!' AND (FLAG & 64 = 0) AND (FLAG &  65536 = 65536) AND (FLAG & 262144 = 0) AND (FLAG & 128 = 0)'
2396                  condition = condition1 .or. condition2
2397                else
2398                  !  FLAG test: selected data (bit 11 OFF) that have passed QC (bit 9 OFF)
2399                  condition = .not. btest(flag, 9) .and. .not. btest(flag, 11) !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 0) AND (FLAG & 2048 = 0)'
2400                end if
2401              else    ! OFFLINE MODE --> want all observations except data rejected for any reason other than rogue check
2402                condition1 = .not. btest(flag, 9) !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 0)'  
2403                ! all good data that passed all QC    
2404                ! "good" data that failed rogue check [bit 9 ON, bit 7 OFF, bit 18 OFF]
2405                condition2 =  btest(flag, 9) .and. .not. btest(flag, 7) .and. .not. btest(flag, 18)  !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 512) AND (FLAG & 128 = 0) AND (FLAG & 262144 = 0)'
2406                condition = condition1 .or. condition2
2407              end if
2408              if (channelIsAllsky) condition = condition .and. .not. btest(flag, 23)
2409            else if(lGeo) then   !  AIRS, IASI, CSR, CRIS  
2410              ! CSR case!    No flag check        =                all data that have passed QC/filtering
2411              !  (FLAG & 2048 = 0)      = bit 11 OFF --> corrected/selected data that have passed QC/filtering
2412              if (allModeCsr .or. offlineMode) then
2413                condition = .true. !
2414              else        
2415                condition = .not. btest(flag, 18) ! ' AND (FLAG & 2048 = 0)' 
2416              endif
2417            else if (lHyperIr) then ! AIRS, IASI and CRIS
2418              !  (FLAG & 2560 = 0)     = bits 9, 11 OFF       --> data that passed QC (rogue and other)
2419              !  (FLAG & 11010176 = 0) = bits 7,19,21,23 OFF  --> "good" data (corrected/selected or not)!  (FLAG & 64 = 64)  = bit 6 ON        --> bias corrected data
2420              !  (FLAG & 256 = 0)  = bit 8 OFF       --> passed selction (not blacklisted, UTIL=1)
2421              !  (FLAG & 2048 = 2048)   = bit 11 ON
2422              !  (FLAG & 65536 = 65536) = bit 16 ON  --> rogue check failure
2423              !  (FLAG & 524288 = 0)    = bit 19 OFF --> not surface affected [experimental, bit 11 may not be on if data
2424              !                                          are to be assimilated]
2425              !  (FLAG & 2097152 = 0)   = bit 21 OFF --> not rejected due to model top transmittance
2426              !  (FLAG & 8388608 = 0)   = bit 23 OFF --> "clear sky" radiance [experimental, bit 11 may not be on if cloudy
2427              !                                          data are assimilated]!  (FLAG & 128 = 0)      = bit 7 OFF  --> not shortwave channel during day
2428              !  (FLAG & 512 = 0)      = bit 9 OFF  --> non-erroneous data that passed O-P rogue check
2429              !! AIRS, IASI:!    bit  8 ON: blacklisted/unselected channel (UTIL=0)
2430              !    bit  9 ON: erroneous/suspect data (9), data failed O-P check (9+16)
2431              !    bit 11 ON: cloud (11+23), surface (11+19), model top transmittance (11+21), shortwave channel+daytime (11+7)
2432              !               not bias corrected (11) (with bit 6 OFF)
2433              if (.not. offlineMode) then
2434                if (allModeHyperIr) then        
2435                  ! good data that have passed all QC (bits 9 and 7,19,21,23 OFF), corrected/selected or not
2436                  condition1  = .not. btest(flag, 9) .and. .not. btest(flag, 7) .and. .not. btest(flag, 19) .and. .not. btest(flag, 21) .and. .not. btest(flag, 23) !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 0) AND (FLAG & 11010176 = 0)'
2437                  ! uncorrected (6 OFF, [11 ON]) good data (7,19,21,23 OFF) that failed QC rogue check only (bits [9],16 ON), selected or not
2438                  condition2  = .not. btest(flag, 6) .and. btest(flag, 11) .and.  .not. btest(flag, 17) .and. .not. btest(flag, 19) .and. .not. btest(flag, 21) .and. .not. btest(flag, 23) 
2439                  !' AND (FLAG & 64 = 0) AND (FLAG & 65536 = 65536) AND (FLAG & 11010176 = 0)'
2440                  condition = condition1 .or. condition2
2441                else 
2442                  ! corrected data that passed all QC and selection excluding cloud/sfc affected obs
2443                  condition =  .not. btest(flag, 9) .and. .not. btest(flag, 11) .and.  .not. btest(flag, 8) .and. .not. btest(flag, 23) .and. .not. btest(flag, 19) 
2444                  !' AND (FLAG & 2560 = 0) AND (FLAG & 256 = 0) AND (FLAG & 8388608 = 0) AND (FLAG & 524288 = 0)'
2445                end if
2446              else! OFFLINE MODE --> Want all observations except data rejected for any reason other than innovation rogue check
2447                !   Assumes that type S or N correction has been applied to all data/channels (all data "corrected")
2448                ! data that passed all QC 
2449                condition1 =  .not. btest(flag, 9) .and. .not. btest(flag, 7) .and. .not. btest(flag, 19) .and. .not. btest(flag, 21) .and. .not. btest(flag, 23) 
2450                !' AND (FLAG & 512 = 0) AND (FLAG & 11010176 = 0)'
2451                ! good data (7,19,21,23 OFF) that failed QC rogue check only (bits [9],16 ON)
2452                condition2 = btest(flag, 9) .and. btest(flag, 16) .and. .not. btest(flag, 7) .and. .not. btest(flag, 19) .and. .not. btest(flag, 21) .and. .not. btest(flag, 23) !' AND (FLAG & 65536 = 65536) AND (FLAG & 11010176 = 0)'
2453                condition = condition1 .or. condition2
2454              end if
2455            end if
2456
2457            if (condition) assim = obs_Assimilated
2458
2459            call obs_bodySet_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex, assim)
2460          end if
2461        end if
2462      end do BODY
2463    end do HEADER
2464 
2465  end subroutine bcs_filterObs
2466
2467  !-----------------------------------------
2468  ! bcs_applyBiasCorrection
2469  !-----------------------------------------
2470  subroutine bcs_applyBiasCorrection(obsSpaceData, column, family_opt)
2471    !
2472    !:Purpose: to apply bias correction from OBS_BCOR to
2473    !           obsSpaceData column column.
2474    !           After the call obsSpaceData body column contains the corrected
2475    !           observation or O-F and OBS_BCOR is not modified.
2476    implicit none
2477
2478    ! Arguments:
2479    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)        :: obsSpaceData
2480    integer, intent(in)                    :: column !obsSpaceData column
2481    character(len=2), intent(in), optional :: family_opt
2482
2483    ! Locals:
2484    integer :: nbcor
2485    integer :: bodyIndex
2486    real(8) :: biascor, Obs
2487    integer :: flag
2488
2489    if (.not. biasActive) return
2490    if (trim(biasMode) /= "apply") return
2491
2492    if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,*) 'bcs_applyBiasCorrection: start'
2493
2494    nbcor = 0
2495    call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, family_opt)
2496    
2497    BODY: do
2498      bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
2499      if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
2500      if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY  
2501      biasCor = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_BCOR, bodyIndex)
2502      if (biasCor /= MPC_missingValue_R8) then
2503        Obs = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, column, bodyIndex)
2504        if (Obs /= MPC_missingValue_R8) then
2505          call obs_bodySet_r(obsSpaceData, column, bodyIndex, real(Obs + biasCor, pre_obsReal))
2506          flag = obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex)
2507          flag = ibset(flag, 6)
2508          call obs_bodySet_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FLG, bodyIndex, flag)
2509          nbcor = nbcor + 1
2510        end if
2511      end if
2512    end do BODY
2513
2514    if (mmpi_myid == 0) then
2515      write(*,*) 'bcs_applyBiasCorrection: apply bias correction for ', nbcor, ' observations'
2516      write(*,*) 'bcs_applyBiasCorrection exiting'
2517    end if
2518
2519  end subroutine bcs_applyBiasCorrection
2520
2521  !-----------------------------------------
2522  ! bcs_refreshBiasCorrection
2523  !-----------------------------------------
2524  subroutine bcs_refreshBiasCorrection(obsSpaceData, columnTrlOnTrlLev)
2525    !
2526    !:Purpose: to apply bias correction from read coefficient file to OBS_VAR
2527    !           After the call OBS_VAR contains the corrected observation
2528    !           and OBS_BCOR is set to applied bias correction
2529    !
2530    implicit none
2531
2532    ! Arguments:
2533    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)        :: obsSpaceData
2534    type(struct_columnData), intent(inout) :: columnTrlOnTrlLev
2535
2536    if (.not.biasActive) return
2537    if (.not. refreshBiasCorrection) return
2538
2539    if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,*) 'bcs_refreshBiasCorrection: start'
2540    call bcs_calcBias(obsSpaceData, columnTrlOnTrlLev)
2541    call bcs_applyBiasCorrection(obsSpaceData, OBS_VAR, "TO")
2542    if (mmpi_myid == 0) write(*,*) 'bcs_refreshBiasCorrection: exit'
2543
2544  end subroutine bcs_refreshBiasCorrection
2545
2546  !-----------------------------------------
2547  ! bcs_getRadiosondeWeight
2548  !-----------------------------------------
2549  subroutine bcs_getRadiosondeWeight(obsSpaceData, lmodify_obserror_opt)
2550    !
2551    !:Purpose: initialize the weights to give more importance to data near radiosonde stations
2552    !
2553    implicit none
2554
2555    ! Arguments:
2556    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsSpaceData
2557    logical, intent(in), optional   :: lmodify_obserror_opt
2558
2559    ! Locals:
2560    integer :: iobs, headerIndex, idatyp, nobs, bodyIndex, stepIndex
2561    logical :: lmodify_obserror
2562    real(8) :: sigmaObs
2563    type(struct_gsv)      :: stateVector_mask, stateVector_mask_4d
2564
2565    lmodify_obserror =.false.
2566
2567    if (present(lmodify_obserror_opt)) lmodify_obserror = lmodify_obserror_opt
2568
2569
2570    if (weightedEstimate) then
2571      call hco_SetupFromFile(hco_mask, './raob_masque.std', 'WEIGHT', GridName_opt='RadiosondeWeight', varName_opt='WT')
2572      call vco_SetupFromFile(vco_mask, './raob_masque.std')   ! IN
2573
2574      call gsv_allocate(stateVector_mask, 1, hco_mask, vco_mask, dateStampList_opt=[-1], varNames_opt=["WT"], &
2575           dataKind_opt=4, mpi_local_opt=.true., mpi_distribution_opt="Tiles")
2576      call gsv_allocate(stateVector_mask_4d, tim_nstepobs, hco_mask, vco_mask, dateStampList_opt=[-1], varNames_opt=["WT"], &
2577           dataKind_opt=4, mpi_local_opt=.true., mpi_distribution_opt="Tiles")
2578
2579      call gio_readFromFile(stateVector_mask, './raob_masque.std', 'WEIGHT', 'O', unitConversion_opt=.false., &
2580           containsFullField_opt=.false.)
2581
2582      do stepIndex = 1, tim_nstepobs
2583        call gsv_copy(stateVector_mask, stateVector_mask_4d, stepIndexOut_opt=stepIndex)
2584      end do
2585      call gsv_deallocate(stateVector_mask)
2586      call col_setVco(column_mask, vco_mask)
2587      nobs = obs_numHeader(obsSpaceData)
2588      call col_allocate(column_mask, nobs, beSilent_opt=.false., varNames_opt=["WT"])
2589
2590      call s2c_nl(stateVector_mask_4d, obsSpaceData, column_mask, hco_mask, &
2591                   'NEAREST', varName_opt="WT", moveObsAtPole_opt=.true.)
2592
2593      call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
2594      iobs = 0
2595      HEADER: do
2596        headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
2597        if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER
2598          
2599        ! process only radiance data to be assimilated?
2600        idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
2601        if (.not. tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
2602          write(*,*) 'bcs_getRadiosondeWeight: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
2603          cycle HEADER
2604        end if
2605        iobs = iobs + 1
2606
2607        RadiosondeWeight(iobs) = col_getElem(column_mask, 1, headerIndex) 
2608
2609        if (lmodify_obserror) then
2610          call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
2611          BODY: do
2612            bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
2613            if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY
2614            
2615            if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY
2616
2617            sigmaObs = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OER, bodyIndex)
2618
2619            sigmaObs = sigmaObs / sqrt(RadiosondeWeight(iobs))
2620            call obs_bodySet_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OER, bodyIndex, sigmaObs) 
2621
2622          end do BODY
2623
2624        end if
2625
2626      end do HEADER
2627      call gsv_deallocate(stateVector_mask_4d)
2628    else
2629      RadiosondeWeight(:) = 1.d0
2630    end if
2631
2632  end subroutine bcs_getRadiosondeWeight
2633
2634  !-----------------------------------------
2635  ! bcs_do_regression
2636  !-----------------------------------------
2637  subroutine bcs_do_regression(columnTrlOnTrlLev, obsSpaceData)
2638    !
2639    !:Purpose: compute the bias correction coefficients by linear regresion
2640    !
2641    implicit none
2642
2643    ! Arguments:
2644    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)        :: obsSpaceData
2645    type(struct_columnData), intent(inout) :: columnTrlOnTrlLev
2646
2647    ! Locals:
2648    integer    :: iSensor, iChannel, npred, nchans, nscan, ndim, ndimmax
2649    integer    :: sensorIndex, iPred1, jPred1, iobs
2650    integer    :: headerIndex, idatyp, nPredMax, ierr, iFov, iScan, idim
2651    integer    :: indxtovs, bodyIndex, chanIndx, predstart, ntot
2652    real(8)    :: OmF, sigmaObs, lambda, norm
2653    real(8)    :: predictor(NumPredictors)
2654    real(8), allocatable :: Matrix(:,:,:), Vector(:,:)
2655    real(8), allocatable :: matrixMpiGlobal(:,:,:), vectorMpiGlobal(:,:)
2656    real(8), allocatable :: pIMatrix(:,:), OmFBias(:,:), omfBiasMpiGlobal(:,:)
2657    real(8), allocatable :: BMatrixMinusOne(:,:), LineVec(:,:)
2658    integer, allocatable :: OmFCount(:,:), omfCountMpiGlobal(:,:)
2659    character(len=80)    :: errorMessage
2660
2661    write(*,*) "bcs_do_regression: start"
2662    if (.not. allocated(trialHeight300m1000)) then
2663      call bcs_getTrialPredictors(obsSpaceData, columnTrlOnTrlLev)
2664      call bcs_computePredictorBiases(obsSpaceData)
2665    end if
2666
2667    call  bcs_getRadiosondeWeight(obsSpaceData)
2668
2669    if (outOmFPredCov) call bcs_outputCvOmPPred(obsSpaceData)
2670
2671    SENSORS:do sensorIndex = 1, tvs_nsensors
2672
2673      if  (.not. tvs_isReallyPresentMpiGLobal(sensorIndex)) cycle SENSORS
2674
2675      nchans = bias(sensorIndex)%numChannels
2676      nscan = bias(sensorIndex)%numscan
2677      npredMax = maxval(bias(sensorIndex)%chans(:)%numActivePredictors)
2678
2679      if (mimicSatbcor) then
2680        ndimmax = npredMax
2681        allocate(OmFBias(nchans,nscan))
2682        OmFBias(:,:) = 0.d0
2683      else
2684        ndimmax = npredMax + nscan - 1
2685      end if
2686
2687      allocate(OmFCount(nchans,nscan))
2688      OmFCount(:,:) = 0
2689
2690      allocate(Matrix(nchans,ndimmax,ndimmax))
2691      Matrix(:,:,:) = 0.d0
2692
2693      allocate(Vector(nchans,ndimmax))
2694      Vector(:,:) = 0.d0
2695
2696      allocate(LineVec(1,ndimmax))
2697
2698      allocate(pIMatrix(ndimmax,ndimmax))
2699
2700
2701      ! First pass throught ObsSpaceData to estimate scan biases and count data
2702
2703      call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
2704      HEADER1: do
2705        headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
2706        if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
2707          
2708        ! process only radiance data to be assimilated?
2709        idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
2710        if (.not. tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
2711          write(*,*) 'bcs_do_regression: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
2712          cycle HEADER1
2713        end if
2714        indxtovs = tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex)
2715        if (indxtovs < 0) cycle HEADER1
2716
2717        iSensor = tvs_lsensor(indxTovs)
2718        if (iSensor /= sensorIndex) cycle HEADER1
2719        iFov = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
2720        if (nscan > 1) then
2721          iScan = iFov
2722        else
2723          iScan = 1
2724        end if
2725
2726        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
2727        BODY1: do
2728          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
2729          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY1
2730            
2731          if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY1 
2732          call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
2733          if (chanindx > 0) then
2734            if  (mimicSatBcor) then
2735              OmF = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OMP, bodyIndex)
2736              OmFBias(chanIndx,iScan) = OmFBias(chanIndx,iScan) + OmF
2737            end if
2738            OmFCount(chanIndx,iScan) =  OmFCount(chanIndx,iScan) + 1
2739          end if
2740        end do BODY1
2741      end do HEADER1
2742
2743      if (mimicSatbcor) allocate(omfBiasMpiGlobal(nchans,nscan))
2744
2745      allocate(omfCountMpiGlobal(nchans,nscan))
2746
2747      if (mimicSatbcor) then
2748        call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_2d( OmFBias, omfBiasMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
2749      end if
2750      call rpn_comm_reduce(OmFCount, omfCountMpiGlobal, size(omfCountMpiGlobal), "mpi_integer", "MPI_SUM", 0, "GRID", ierr)
2751
2752      if (ierr /= 0) then
2753        write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_do_regression: MPI communication error 2", ierr 
2754        call utl_abort(errorMessage)
2755      end if
2756      if (mimicSatbcor)  then
2757        if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
2758          where(omfCountMpiGlobal == 0) omfBiasMpiGlobal = 0.d0
2759          where(omfCountMpiGlobal > 0) omfBiasMpiGlobal = omfBiasMpiGlobal / omfCountMpiGlobal
2760        end if
2761        call rpn_comm_bcast(omfBiasMpiGlobal, size(omfBiasMpiGlobal), "mpi_double_precision", 0, "GRID", ierr)
2762        if (ierr /= 0) then
2763          write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_do_regression: MPI communication error 3", ierr 
2764          call utl_abort(errorMessage)
2765        end if
2766        do iChannel = 1, nchans
2767          bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%coeff_fov(:) = omfBiasMpiGlobal(iChannel, :)
2768        end do
2769        deallocate(omfBiasMpiGlobal)
2770      end if
2771     
2772      ! Second pass to fill matrices and vectors
2773      call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
2774      iobs = 0
2775      HEADER2: do
2776        headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
2777        if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER2
2778
2779        ! process only radiance data to be assimilated?
2780        idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
2781        if (.not. tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
2782          write(*,*) 'bcs_do_regression: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
2783          cycle HEADER2
2784        end if
2785        iobs = iobs + 1
2786        indxtovs = tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex)
2787        if (indxtovs < 0) cycle HEADER2
2788
2789        iSensor = tvs_lsensor(indxTovs)
2790        if (iSensor /= sensorIndex) cycle HEADER2
2791          
2792        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
2793        iFov = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_FOV, headerIndex)
2794        if (nscan > 1) then
2795          iScan = iFov
2796        else
2797          iScan = 1
2798        end if
2799        BODY2: do
2800          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
2801          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
2802          if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY2 
2803          call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
2804          if (chanIndx > 0) then
2805            call bcs_getPredictors(predictor, headerIndex, iobs, chanIndx, obsSpaceData)
2806            OmF = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OMP, bodyIndex)
2807
2808            if (mimicSatbcor) OmF = OmF - bias(sensorIndex)%chans(chanIndx)%coeff_fov(iScan)
2809            
2810            LineVec(:,:) = 0.d0
2811
2812            if (mimicSatbcor) then
2813              idim = 0
2814              predstart = 1
2815              lambda = 1.d0
2816            else
2817              LineVec(1,iScan) = 1.d0
2818              idim = nscan
2819              predstart = 2
2820              sigmaObs = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OER, bodyIndex)
2821              lambda = 1.d0 / (sigmaObs ** 2)
2822            end if
2823          
2824            lambda = lambda * RadiosondeWeight(iobs)
2825
2826            do iPred1 = predstart, bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%NumActivePredictors
2827              jPred1 = bias(iSensor)%chans(chanIndx)%PredictorIndex(iPred1)
2828              idim = idim + 1
2829              LineVec(1,idim) = predictor(jPred1)
2830            end do
2831            Matrix(chanindx,:,:) = Matrix(chanindx,:,:) + matmul(transpose(LineVec),LineVec) * lambda
2832            Vector(chanIndx,:) =  Vector(chanIndx,:) + LineVec(1,:) * OmF  * lambda
2833          end if
2834        end do BODY2
2835      end do HEADER2
2836
2837      if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
2838        allocate(matrixMpiGlobal(nchans,ndimmax,ndimmax))
2839        allocate(vectorMpiGlobal(nchans,ndimmax))
2840      else
2841        allocate(matrixMpiGlobal(1,1,1))
2842        allocate(vectorMpiGlobal(1,1))
2843      end if
2844
2845      ! communication MPI pour tout avoir sur tache 0
2846      call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_3d( Matrix, matrixMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
2847      call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_2d( Vector, vectorMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
2848
2849      do iChannel = 1, nchans
2850
2851        if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
2852          ntot = sum(omfCountMpiGlobal(iChannel, :))
2853          bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%coeff_nobs = ntot
2854          if (ntot > 0 .and. .not. mimicSatbcor) then
2855            norm = 1.d0 / (ntot) 
2856            matrixMpiGlobal(iChannel,:,:) =  matrixMpiGlobal(iChannel,:,:) * norm
2857            vectorMpiGlobal(iChannel,:) = vectorMpiGlobal(iChannel,:) * norm
2858          end if
2859
2860          nPred =  bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%numActivePredictors
2861          if (mimicSatbcor) then
2862            ndim = npred
2863          else
2864            ndim = npred + nscan -1 
2865            allocate(BMatrixMinusOne(ndim,ndim))
2866            BMatrixMinusOne(:,:) = 0.d0 
2867            BMatrixMinusOne(1:nscan,1:nscan) = matmul(bias(sensorIndex)%BMinusHalfScanBias, bias(sensorIndex)%BMinusHalfScanBias)
2868            do iPred1 = 2, bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%numActivePredictors
2869              BMatrixMinusOne(nscan - 1 + iPred1,nscan - 1 + iPred1) = (1.d0 / (bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%stddev(iPred1)) ** 2)
2870            end do
2871            matrixMpiGlobal(iChannel,1:ndim,1:ndim) = matrixMpiGlobal(iChannel,1:ndim,1:ndim) + BMatrixMinusOne(:,:)
2872            deallocate(BMatrixMinusOne)
2873          end if
2874
2875          pIMatrix(:,:) = 0.d0
2876          call utl_pseudo_inverse(matrixMpiGlobal(iChannel, 1:ndim, 1:ndim), pIMatrix(1:ndim, 1:ndim))
2877          LineVec(1,1:ndim) = matmul(pIMatrix(1:ndim,1:ndim), vectorMpiGlobal(iChannel,1:ndim))
2878          !call dsymv("L", ndim, 1.d0, pIMatrix, ndim,vectorMpiGlobal(iChannel,:), 1, 0.d0, LineVec(1,1:ndim), 1)
2879        end if
2880
2881        call rpn_comm_bcast(ndim, 1, "mpi_integer", 0, "GRID", ierr)
2882        call rpn_comm_bcast(npred, 1, "mpi_integer", 0, "GRID", ierr)
2883
2884        call rpn_comm_bcast(LineVec(1,1:ndim), ndim, "mpi_double_precision", 0, "GRID", ierr)
2885        if (ierr /= 0) then
2886          write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_do_regression: MPI communication error 6", ierr 
2887          call utl_abort(errorMessage)
2888        end if
2889
2890        if (outCoeffCov) then
2891          allocate (bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%coeffCov(ndim,ndim)) 
2892          call rpn_comm_bcast(pIMatrix(1:ndim, 1:ndim), ndim * ndim, "mpi_double_precision", 0, "GRID", ierr)
2893          bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%coeffCov(:,:) = pIMatrix(1:ndim,1:ndim)
2894        end if
2895
2896        if (mimicSatbcor) then
2897          bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%coeff(:) = LineVec(1,1:npred)
2898        else
2899          bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%coeff_fov(:) = LineVec(1,1:nscan)
2900          bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%coeff(1) = 0.d0
2901          bias(sensorIndex)%chans(iChannel)%coeff(2:) = LineVec(1,nscan+1:ndim)
2902        end if
2903
2904      end do
2905
2906      deallocate(LineVec)
2907      deallocate(Matrix)
2908      deallocate(Vector  )
2909      deallocate(omfCountMpiGlobal)
2910      deallocate(matrixMpiGlobal)
2911      deallocate(vectorMpiGlobal)
2912      deallocate(pIMatrix)
2913      if (allocated(OmFBias)) deallocate(OmFBias)
2914      deallocate(OmFCount)
2915       
2916    end do SENSORS
2917
2918  end subroutine bcs_do_regression
2919
2920
2921  !-----------------------------------------
2922  ! bcs_outputCvOmPPred
2923  !-----------------------------------------
2924  subroutine bcs_outputCvOmPPred(obsSpaceData)
2925    !
2926    !:Purpose: compute and output OmF-predictors covariance and correlation matrices
2927    !
2928    implicit none
2929    ! Arguments:
2930    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)        :: obsSpaceData
2931    ! Locals:
2932    integer :: sensorIndex, headerIndex, bodyIndex, channelIndex, predictorIndex,predictorIndex2,nchans
2933    integer :: idatyp, indxtovs, iSensor, chanIndx, Iobs, ierr
2934    Real(8):: OmF
2935    real(8), allocatable :: OmFBias(:), Matrix(:,:,:), PredBias(:,:)
2936    integer, allocatable :: Count(:), CountMpiGlobal(:)
2937    real(8), allocatable :: OmFBiasMpiGlobal(:), predBiasMpiGlobal(:,:), MatrixMpiGLobal(:,:,:)
2938    character(len=128)   :: errorMessage
2939    real(8) :: vector(1,numPredictors), predictor(numPredictors),correlation(numPredictors,numPredictors)
2940    real(8) :: sigma(numPredictors)
2941    integer :: iuncov, iuncorr
2942
2943    write(*,*) "bcs_outputCvOmPPred: Starting"
2944
2945    SENSORS:do sensorIndex = 1, tvs_nsensors
2946  
2947      if  (.not. tvs_isReallyPresentMpiGLobal(sensorIndex)) cycle SENSORS
2948      write(*,*) "sensor ", sensorIndex
2949
2950      nchans = bias(sensorIndex)%numChannels ! from bcif
2951
2952      allocate(OmFBias(nchans))
2953      OmFBias(:) = 0.d0
2954
2955      allocate(predBias(nchans,numPredictors))
2956      predBias(:,:) = 0.d0
2957
2958      allocate(Count(nchans))
2959      Count(:) = 0
2960
2961      iobs = 0
2962      ! First pass throught ObsSpaceData to estimate biases and count data
2963      call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
2964      HEADER1: do
2965        headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
2966        if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER1
2967        ! process only radiance data to be assimilated?
2968        idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
2969        if (.not. tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
2970          write(*,*) 'bcs_outputCvOmPPred: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
2971          cycle HEADER1
2972        end if
2973        iobs = iobs + 1
2974        indxtovs = tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex)
2975        if (indxtovs < 0) cycle HEADER1
2976        iSensor = tvs_lsensor(indxTovs)
2977        if (iSensor /= sensorIndex) cycle HEADER1
2978        
2979        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
2980        BODY1: do
2981          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
2982          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY1
2983          if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY1 
2984          call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
2985          if (chanindx > 0) then
2986            OmF = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OMP, bodyIndex)
2987            OmFBias(chanIndx) = OmFBias(chanIndx) + OmF
2988            count(chanIndx) = count(chanIndx) + 1
2989            call bcs_getPredictors(predictor, headerIndex, iobs, chanIndx, obsSpaceData)
2990            predBias(chanIndx,:) = predBias(chanIndx,:) + predictor(:)
2991          end if
2992        end do BODY1
2993      end do HEADER1
2994
2995      allocate(omfBiasMpiGlobal(nchans))
2996      allocate(countMpiGlobal(nchans))
2997      allocate(predBiasMpiGlobal(nchans,numPredictors))
2998
2999      call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_1d(OmFBias, omfBiasMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
3000      call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_2d(predBias, predBiasMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
3001
3002      call rpn_comm_reduce(count, countMpiGlobal, size(countMpiGlobal), "mpi_integer", "MPI_SUM", 0, "GRID", ierr)
3003      if (ierr /= 0) then
3004        write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_outputCvOmPPred: MPI communication error 1", ierr 
3005        call utl_abort(errorMessage)
3006      end if
3007
3008      if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
3009        where(countMpiGlobal == 0) omfBiasMpiGlobal = 0.d0
3010        where(countMpiGlobal > 0) omfBiasMpiGlobal = omfBiasMpiGlobal / countMpiGlobal
3011        do channelIndex =1, nchans
3012          if (countMpiGlobal(channelIndex) == 0) predBiasMpiGlobal(channelIndex,:) = 0.d0
3013          if (countMpiGlobal(channelIndex) > 0) predBiasMpiGlobal(channelIndex,:) = predBiasMpiGlobal(channelIndex,:) / countMpiGlobal(channelIndex)
3014        end do
3015      end if
3016      call rpn_comm_bcast(omfBiasMpiGlobal, size(omfBiasMpiGlobal), "mpi_double_precision", 0, "GRID", ierr)
3017      if (ierr /= 0) then
3018        write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_outputCvOmPPred: MPI communication error 4", ierr 
3019        call utl_abort(errorMessage)
3020      end if
3021      call rpn_comm_bcast(predBiasMpiGlobal, size(predBiasMpiGlobal), "mpi_double_precision", 0, "GRID", ierr)
3022      if (ierr /= 0) then
3023        write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_outputCvOmPPred: MPI communication error 3", ierr 
3024        call utl_abort(errorMessage)
3025      end if
3026      call rpn_comm_bcast(countMpiGlobal, size(countMpiGlobal), "mpi_integer", 0, "GRID", ierr)
3027      if (ierr /= 0) then
3028        write(errorMessage,*) "bcs_outputCvOmPPred: MPI communication error 4", ierr 
3029        call utl_abort(errorMessage)
3030      end if
3031
3032      deallocate(OmFBias)
3033      deallocate(predBias)
3034      deallocate(Count)
3035      allocate(matrix(nchans,numPredictors,numPredictors))
3036      matrix(:,:,:) = 0.d0
3037
3038      ! Second pass to fill covariance Matrix
3039      call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, 'TO')
3040      iobs = 0
3041      HEADER2: do
3042        headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
3043        if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADER2
3044
3045        ! process only radiance data to be assimilated?
3046        idatyp = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
3047        if (.not. tvs_isIdBurpTovs(idatyp)) then
3048          write(*,*) 'bcs_outputCvOmPPred: warning unknown radiance codtyp present check NAMTOVSINST', idatyp
3049          cycle HEADER2
3050        end if
3051        iobs = iobs + 1
3052        indxtovs = tvs_tovsIndex(headerIndex)
3053        if (indxtovs < 0) cycle HEADER2
3054
3055        iSensor = tvs_lsensor(indxTovs)
3056        if (iSensor /= sensorIndex) cycle HEADER2
3057          
3058        call obs_set_current_body_list(obsSpaceData, headerIndex)
3059        BODY2: do
3060          bodyIndex = obs_getBodyIndex(obsSpaceData)
3061          if (bodyIndex < 0) exit BODY2
3062          if (obs_bodyElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ASS, bodyIndex) /= obs_assimilated) cycle BODY2 
3063          call bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, iSensor, chanIndx, bodyIndex)
3064          if (chanIndx > 0) then
3065            call bcs_getPredictors(predictor, headerIndex, iobs, chanIndx, obsSpaceData)
3066            predictor(:) = predictor(:) - predBiasMpiGLobal(chanIndx,:)
3067            OmF = obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_OMP, bodyIndex)
3068            OmF = OmF - omfBiasMpiGlobal(chanIndx)
3069            vector(1,1) = OmF
3070            vector(1,2:numPredictors) = predictor(2:numPredictors)
3071            Matrix(chanindx,:,:) = Matrix(chanindx,:,:) + matmul(transpose(vector),vector)
3072          end if
3073        end do BODY2
3074      end do HEADER2
3075
3076      if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
3077        allocate(matrixMpiGlobal(nchans,numPredictors,numPredictors))
3078      else
3079        allocate(matrixMpiGlobal(1,1,1))
3080      end if
3081
3082      ! communication MPI pour tout avoir sur tache 0
3083      call mmpi_reduce_sumR8_3d(matrix, matrixMpiGlobal, 0, "GRID" )
3084      deallocate(matrix)
3085      deallocate(OmFBiasMpiGLobal)
3086      deallocate(predBiasMpiGLobal)
3087      if (mmpi_myId == 0) then
3088        call utl_open_asciifile("covarianceMatrix_" // trim(tvs_instrumentName(sensorIndex)) //  &
3089             "_" // trim(tvs_satelliteName(sensorIndex)) // ".dat", iuncov)
3090        call utl_open_asciifile("correlationMatrix_" // trim(tvs_instrumentName(sensorIndex)) //  &
3091             "_" // trim(tvs_satelliteName(sensorIndex)) // ".dat", iuncorr)
3092        do channelIndex = 1, nchans
3093          if (countMpiGlobal(channelIndex) > 1) then
3094            matrixMpiGlobal(channelIndex,:,:) = matrixMpiGlobal(channelIndex,:,:) / countMpiGlobal(channelIndex)
3095           
3096            write(iuncov,*) "OmF Pred covariance Matrix for channel ", &
3097                 bias(sensorIndex)%chans(channelIndex)%channelNum, "instrument ", &
3098                 trim(tvs_instrumentName(sensorIndex))," ", &
3099                 trim(tvs_satelliteName(sensorIndex))
3100            write(iuncov,'(10x,A6)',advance="no") "OmF"
3101            do predictorIndex = 2, numPredictors
3102              write(iuncov,'(T6,A6,1x)',advance="no") predTab(predictorIndex) 
3103            end do
3104            write(iuncov,*)
3105            write(iuncov,'(A6)',advance="no") "Omf"
3106            write(iuncov,'(100f12.6)') matrixMpiGlobal(channelIndex,1,:)
3107            do predictorIndex = 2, numPredictors
3108              write(iuncov,'(A6)',advance="no") predTab(predictorIndex)
3109              write(iuncov,'(100f12.6)') matrixMpiGlobal(channelIndex,predictorIndex,:)
3110            end do
3111            sigma(:) = 0
3112            do predictorIndex = 1,numPredictors
3113              if ( matrixMpiGlobal(channelIndex,predictorIndex,predictorIndex) >0.d0) &
3114                   sigma(predictorIndex) = sqrt(matrixMpiGlobal(channelIndex,predictorIndex,predictorIndex))
3115            end do
3116            do predictorIndex = 1, numPredictors
3117              do predictorIndex2 =1, numPredictors
3118                correlation(predictorIndex, predictorIndex2) =  &
3119                     matrixMpiGlobal(channelIndex,predictorIndex,predictorIndex2) / &
3120                     (sigma(predictorIndex) * sigma(predictorIndex2) )
3121              end do
3122            end do
3123            write(iuncorr,*) "OmF Pred correlation Matrix for channel ", &
3124                 bias(sensorIndex)%chans(channelIndex)%channelNum,"instrument ", &
3125                 trim(tvs_instrumentName(sensorIndex))," ", &
3126                 trim(tvs_satelliteName(sensorIndex))
3127            write(iuncorr,'(10x,A6)',advance="no") "OmF"
3128            do predictorIndex = 2, numPredictors
3129              write(iuncorr,'(T6,A6,1x)',advance="no") predTab(predictorIndex) 
3130            end do
3131            write(iuncorr,*)
3132            write(iuncorr,'(A6)',advance="no") "Omf"
3133            write(iuncorr,'(100f12.6)') correlation(1,:)
3134            do predictorIndex = 2, numPredictors
3135              write(iuncorr,'(A6)',advance="no") predTab(predictorIndex)
3136              write(iuncorr,'(100f12.6)') correlation(predictorIndex,:)
3137            end do
3138          end if
3139        end do
3140        ierr = fclos(iuncov)
3141        ierr = fclos(iuncorr)
3142      end if
3143          
3144      deallocate(countMpiGlobal)
3145      deallocate(matrixMpiGlobal)
3146       
3147    end do SENSORS
3148
3149  end subroutine bcs_outputCvOmPPred
3150
3151  !----------------------
3152  ! bcs_Finalize
3153  !----------------------
3154  subroutine bcs_Finalize
3155    !
3156    !:Purpose: release allocated memory for the module
3157    !
3158    implicit none
3159
3160    ! Locals:
3161    integer    :: iSensor, iChannel
3162
3163    if (.not. biasActive) return
3164
3165    if (allocated(trialHeight300m1000)) deallocate(trialHeight300m1000)
3166    if (allocated(trialHeight50m200)) deallocate(trialHeight50m200)
3167    if (allocated(trialHeight1m10)) deallocate(trialHeight1m10)
3168    if (allocated(trialHeight5m50)) deallocate(trialHeight5m50)
3169    if (allocated(trialTG)) deallocate(trialTG)
3170    if (allocated(RadiosondeWeight)) deallocate(RadiosondeWeight)
3171
3172    do iSensor = 1, tvs_nSensors
3173      if (allocated(bias(iSensor)%BHalfScanBias)) &
3174           deallocate(bias(iSensor)%BHalfScanBias)
3175      if (allocated(bias(iSensor)%BMinusHalfScanBias)) &
3176           deallocate(bias(iSensor)%BMinusHalfScanBias)
3177      do iChannel =1, bias(iSensor)%numChannels
3178        deallocate(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%stddev)
3179        deallocate(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr)
3180        deallocate(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%predictorIndex)
3181        if (allocated(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov)) deallocate(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffIncr_fov)
3182        deallocate(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeff_offset)
3183        if (allocated(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeff)) deallocate(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeff)
3184        if (allocated(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeff_fov))  deallocate(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeff_fov)
3185        if (allocated(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffCov)) deallocate(bias(iSensor)%chans(iChannel)%coeffCov)
3186      end do
3187      deallocate(bias(iSensor)%chans)
3188    end do
3189
3190  end subroutine bcs_Finalize
