3272  !-----------------------------------------
3273  ! read_bcif
3274  !-----------------------------------------
3275  subroutine read_bcif(bcifFile, hspec, ncan, can, bcmode, bctype, npred, pred, global_opt, exitcode)
3276    !
3277    !:Purpose: to read channel-specific bias correction (BC) information (predictors) for instrument from BCIF.
3278    !
3279    implicit none
3280
3281    ! Arguments:
3282    character(len=*), intent(in)  :: bcifFile
3283    logical, intent(in)           :: hspec
3284    integer, intent(out)          :: exitcode, ncan
3285    integer, intent(out)          :: can(tvs_maxchannelnumber), npred(tvs_maxchannelnumber)
3286    character(len=3), intent(in)  :: global_opt
3287    character(len=1), intent(out) :: bcmode(tvs_maxchannelnumber), bctype(tvs_maxchannelnumber)
3288    character(len=2), intent(out) :: pred(tvs_maxchannelnumber,numpredictorsBCIF)
3289
3290    ! Locals:
3291    character(len=7)             :: instrum
3292    integer                      :: i, j, ier, ii, iun
3293    character(len=64)            :: line
3294    integer                      :: xcan, xnpred, chknp
3295    character(len=1)             :: xbcmode, xbctype
3296    character(len=2)             :: xpred(numpredictors)
3297    ! Reads channel-specific bias correction (BC) information (predictors) for instrument from BCIF.
3298    ! Channel 0 values are global or default values (optionally applied to all channels).
3299    ! Returns BC information for all channels to calling routine.
3300    !
3301    !              Sample BCIF
3302    ! AMSUA  15                                                   <--- instrument and number of channels
3303    !CHAN  MODE  TYPE  NPRED PRED1 PRED2 PRED3 PRED4 PRED5 PRED6
3304    !   0     D     C      4    T1    T2    T3    T4    XX    XX  <--- channel "0" global or default values
3305    !   1     D     C      2    T1    T2    XX    XX    XX    XX
3306    !   2     D     C      3    BT    T1    T2    XX    XX    XX
3307    !   3     S     C      2    T3    T4    XX    XX    XX    XX
3308    ! ....
3309    ! ....
3310    ! ===================  24 APRIL 2014    LIST-DIRECTED I/O VERSION ==============================================
3311    !   CALL read_bcif(iunbc, bc_instrum, bc_ncan, bc_can, bc_mode, bc_type, bc_npred, bc_pred, global_opt, exitcode)
3312    !
3313    !  global_opt = NON    Read channel-specific data for ALL ncan channels from BCIF (channel 0 ignored)
3314    !               OUI    Read channel 0 data and apply to all ncan channels (global values)
3315    !               DEF    Read channel 0 data and apply as default values for all ncan channels;
3316    !                      then scan the rest of the BCIF for any channel-specific data that will
3317    !                      override the default values.
3318    !
3319    !  NOTE: For hyperspectral instruments (e.g. AIRS, IASI, CrIS) the BCIF must always contain records for ALL ncan channels.
3320    !          If global_opt = OUI, only the channel numbers are needed in column 1 (CHAN) to get the list
3321    !            of channel numbers.
3322    !          If global_opt = DEF, other column data (MODE, TYPE, NPRED, PRED1,...) are entered only for
3323    !            those channels for which the default (channel 0) values are to be overridden.
3324    !
3325    !        For standard instruments (AMSU, SSM/I, SSMIS), with consecutive channels 1,2,3,...,ncan:
3326    !           If global_opt = OUI, only the channel 0 record is needed in the BCIF (any other records after
3327    !             channel 0 are ignored (not read).
3328    !           If global_opt = DEF, the channel 0 record (default values) and only records for those channels
3329    !             for which values are different from defaults are needed in the BCIF.
3330    
3331    exitcode = -1
3332
3333    iun = 0
3334    ier = fnom(iun, bcifFile, 'FMT', 0)
3335    if (ier /= 0) then
3336      call utl_abort('read_bcif: ERROR - Problem opening the bcif file!' // trim(bcifFile)) 
3337    end if
3338    
3339    read(iun,*) instrum, ncan
3340    read(iun,'(A64)') line
3341
3342    ! For GLOBAL option, read global values from first line (channel 0) and clone to all channels
3343    if (global_opt == 'OUI' .or. global_opt == 'DEF') then 
3344      ! Read channel 0 information
3345      read(iun, *, iostat=ier) can(1), bcmode(1), bctype(1), npred(1), (pred(1,j), j = 1, numpredictorsbcif)
3346      if (ier /= 0) then
3347        write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: Error reading channel 0 data!'
3348        exitcode = ier
3349        return
3350      end if
3351      if (can(1) /= 0) then
3352        write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: Channel 0 global values not found!'
3353        exitcode = -1
3354        return
3355      end if
3356      ! Clone channel 0 information to all ncan channels
3357      if (.not. hspec) then
3358        ! For instruments with consecutive channels 1,2,3,...ncan (e.g. AMSU, SSM/I)
3359        !  -- no need to read the channel numbers from the BCIF
3360        do i = 2, ncan+1
3361          can(i) = i - 1
3362          bcmode(i) = bcmode(1)
3363          bctype(i) = bctype(1)
3364          npred(i) = npred(1)
3365          do j = 1, numpredictorsbcif
3366            pred(i,j) = pred(1,j)
3367          end do
3368        end do
3369      else
3370        ! For hyperspectral instruments (channel subsets), read the channel numbers from the BCIF
3371        do i = 2, ncan + 1
3372          read(iun, *, iostat=ier) xcan
3373          if (ier /= 0) then
3374            write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: Error reading channel numbers!'
3375            exitcode = ier
3376            return
3377          end if
3378          can(i) = xcan
3379          bcmode(i) = bcmode(1)
3380          bctype(i) = bctype(1)
3381          npred(i) = npred(1)
3382          do j = 1, numpredictorsbcif
3383            pred(i,j) = pred(1,j)
3384          end do
3385        end do
3386        ! Reposition the file to just after channel 0 record
3387        rewind (iun)
3388        read(iun,*) instrum, ncan
3389        read(iun,'(A64)') line
3390        read(iun,*,iostat=ier) xcan, xbcmode, xbctype, xnpred, (xpred(j), j = 1, numpredictorsbcif)
3391      end if
3392      ! For global_opt == 'DEF' check for channel-specific information and overwrite the default (channel 0) values
3393      ! for the channel with the values from the file
3394      if (global_opt == 'DEF') then
3395        if (.not. hspec) then
3396          do
3397            read(iun,*,iostat=ier) xcan, xbcmode, xbctype, xnpred, (xpred(j), j = 1, numpredictorsbcif)
3398            if (ier < 0) exit  
3399            if (ier > 0) then
3400              write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: Error reading file!'
3401              exitcode = ier
3402              return
3403            end if
3404            ii = xcan + 1
3405            if (ii > ncan + 1) then
3406              write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: Channel number in BCIF exceeds number of channels!'
3407              write(*,'(A,1X,I4,1X,I4)') '           Channel, ncan = ', xcan, ncan
3408              exitcode = -1
3409              return
3410            end if
3411            bcmode(ii) = xbcmode
3412            bctype(ii) = xbctype
3413            npred(ii) = xnpred
3414            do j = 1, numpredictorsbcif
3415              pred(ii,j) = xpred(j)
3416            end do
3417          end do
3418        else
3419          ! For hyperspectral instruments
3420          do i = 2, ncan + 1
3421            read(iun, *,iostat=ier) xcan, xbcmode, xbctype, xnpred, (xpred(j), j = 1, numpredictorsbcif)
3422            if (ier /= 0) cycle  
3423            bcmode(i) = xbcmode
3424            bctype(i) = xbctype
3425            npred(i) = xnpred
3426            do j = 1, numpredictorsbcif
3427              pred(i,j) = xpred(j)
3428            end do
3429          end do
3430        end if
3431      end if
3432    end if
3433    ! Non-GLOBAL: Read the entire file for channel specific values (all channels)
3434    ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3435    if (global_opt == 'NON') then
3436      ii = 1
3437      do
3438        read(iun,*,iostat=ier) can(ii), bcmode(ii), bctype(ii), npred(ii), (pred(ii,j), j = 1, numpredictorsbcif)
3439        if (ier < 0) exit  
3440        if (ier > 0) then
3441          write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: Error reading file!'
3442          exitcode = ier
3443          return
3444        end if
3445        if (ii == 1) then
3446          if (can(ii) /= 0) then
3447            write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: Channel 0 global/default values not found!'
3448            exitcode = -1
3449            return
3450          end if
3451        end if
3452        ii = ii + 1
3453      end do
3454      if (ii - 2 < ncan) then
3455        write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: Number of channels in file is less than specified value (NCAN). Changing value of NCAN.'
3456        ncan = ii - 2
3457      end if
3458      if (ii > ncan + 2) then
3459        write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: ERROR -- Number of channels in file is greater than specified value (NCAN)!'
3460        exitcode = -1
3461        return
3462      end if
3463    end if
3464    ! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
3465    write(*,*) ' '
3466    write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: Bias correction information for each channel (from BCIF):'
3467    write(*,'(1X,A7,1X,I4)') instrum, ncan
3468    write(*,*) line
3469    do i = 1, ncan + 1
3470      chknp = count(pred(i,:) /= 'XX')
3471      if (chknp /= npred(i)) npred(i) = chknp
3472      if (npred(i) == 0 .and. bctype(i) == 'C') bctype(i) = 'F'
3473      write(*,'(I4,2(5X,A1),5X,I2,6(4X,A2))') can(i), bcmode(i), bctype(i), npred(i), (pred(i,j), j = 1, numpredictorsbcif)
3474    end do
3475    write(*,*) 'read_BCIF: exit '
3476
3477    ier = fclos(iun)
3478    exitcode = 0
3479
3480  end subroutine read_bcif
3481  
3482  !-----------------------------------------
3483  ! read_coeff
3484  !-----------------------------------------
3485  subroutine read_coeff(sats, chans, fovbias, coeff, nsat, nchan, nfov, npred, cinstrum, coeff_file, ptypes, ndata)
3486    !
3487    !:Purpose: to read radiance bias correction coefficients file
3488    !
3489    implicit none
3490
3491    ! Arguments:
3492    character(len=10), intent(out) :: sats(:)       ! dim(maxsat), satellite names 1
3493    integer, intent(out)           :: chans(:,:)    ! dim(maxsat, maxchan), channel numbers 2
3494    real(8), intent(out)           :: fovbias(:,:,:)! dim(maxsat,maxchan,maxfov), bias as F(fov) 3
3495    real(8), intent(out)           :: coeff(:,:,:)  ! dim(maxsat,maxchan,maxpred+1) 4
3496    integer, intent(out)           :: nsat          !5
3497    integer, intent(out)           :: nchan(:)      ! dim(maxsat), number of channels 6
3498    integer, intent(out)           :: nfov          !7
3499    integer, intent(out)           :: npred(:,:)    ! dim(maxsat, maxchan), number of predictors !8
3500    character(len=7), intent(out)  :: cinstrum      ! string: instrument (e.g. AMSUB) 9
3501    character(len=*), intent(in)   :: coeff_file    ! 10
3502    character(len=2), intent(out)  :: ptypes(:,:,:) ! dim(maxsat,maxchan,maxpred) 11
3503    integer, intent(out)           :: ndata(:,:)    ! dim(maxsat, maxchan), number of channels 12
3504
3505    ! Locals:
3506    character(len=8)               :: sat
3507    character(len=120)             :: line
3508    integer                        :: chan
3509    integer                        :: nbfov, nbpred, i, j, k, ier, istat, ii, nobs
3510    logical                        :: newsat, fileExists
3511    real                           :: dummy
3512    integer                        :: iun
3513    integer                        :: maxsat    
3514    integer                        :: maxpred 
3515    !   sats(nsat)            = satellite names
3516    !   chans(nsat,nchan(i))  = channel numbers of each channel of each satellite i
3517    !   npred(nsat,nchan(i))  = number of predictors for each channel of each satellite i
3518    !   fovbias(i,j,k)        = bias for satellite i, channel j, FOV k   k=1,nfov
3519    !     if FOV not considered for instrument, nfov = 1 and fovbias is global bias for channel
3520    !   coeff(i,j,1)          = regression constant
3521    !   coeff(i,j,2), ..., coeff(i,j,npred(i,j)) = predictor coefficients
3522    !   nsat, nchan, nfov, cinstrum (output) are determined from file
3523    !   if returned nsat = 0, coeff_file was empty
3524
3525
3526    inquire(file=trim(coeff_file), exist=fileExists)
3527    if (fileExists) then
3528      iun = 0
3529      ier = fnom(iun, coeff_file, 'FMT', 0)
3530      if (ier /= 0) then
3531        call utl_abort('read_coeff: ERROR - Problem opening the coefficient file! ' // trim(coeff_file))
3532      end if
3533
3534      write(*,*)
3535      write(*,*) 'read_coeff: Bias correction coefficient file open = ', coeff_file
3536
3537    end if
3538
3539    maxsat =  size(sats)
3540    maxpred = size(ptypes, dim = 3)
3541
3542    coeff(:,:,:) = 0.0
3543    fovbias(:,:,:) = 0.0
3544    sats(:) = 'XXXXXXXX'
3545    cinstrum = 'XXXXXXX'
3546    chans(:,:) = 0
3547    npred(:,:) = 0
3548    nsat = 0
3549    nchan(:) = 0
3550    nfov = 0
3551    ptypes(:,:,:) = 'XX'
3552
3553    if (.not. fileExists) then
3554      write(*,*) 'read_coeff: Warning- File ' // trim(coeff_file) //'not there.'
3555      return
3556    end if
3557
3558    read(iun,*,iostat=istat)
3559
3560    if (istat /= 0) then
3561      write(*,*) 'read_coeff: Warning- File appears empty.'
3562      ier = fclos(iun)
3563      return
3564    end if
3565
3566    rewind(iun)
3567
3568    ii = 0
3569
3570    ! Loop over the satellites/channels in the file
3571
3572    do
3573      read(iun,'(A)',iostat=istat) line
3574      if (istat < 0) exit
3575      if (line(1:3) == 'SAT') then
3576        newsat = .true.
3577        read(line,'(T53,A8,1X,A7,1X,I6,1X,I8,1X,I2,1X,I3)',iostat=istat) sat, cinstrum, chan, nobs, nbpred, nbfov
3578        if (istat /= 0) then
3579          call utl_abort('read_coeff: ERROR - reading data from SATELLITE line in coeff file!')
3580        end if
3581        do i = 1, maxsat
3582          if (trim(sats(i)) == trim(sat)) then
3583            newsat = .false.
3584            ii = i
3585          end if
3586        end do
3587        if (newsat) then
3588          ii = ii + 1
3589          if (ii > maxsat) then
3590            call utl_abort('read_coeff: ERROR - max number of satellites exceeded in coeff file!')
3591          end if
3592          sats(ii) = sat
3593          if (ii > 1) nchan(ii - 1) = j
3594          j = 1
3595        else
3596          j = j + 1
3597        end if
3598        chans(ii,j) = chan
3599        npred(ii,j) = nbpred
3600        ndata(ii,j) = nobs
3601        if (nbpred > maxpred) then
3602          call utl_abort('read_coeff: ERROR - max number of predictors exceeded in coeff file!')
3603        end if
3604        read(iun,'(A)',iostat=istat) line
3605        if (line(1:3) /= 'PTY') then
3606          call utl_abort('read_coeff: ERROR - list of predictors is missing in coeff file!')
3607        end if
3608        if (nbpred > 0) then
3609          read(line,'(T8,6(1X,A2))', iostat = istat) (ptypes(ii,j,k), k = 1, nbpred)
3610          if (istat /= 0) then
3611            call utl_abort('read_coeff: ERROR - reading predictor types from PTYPES line in coeff file!')
3612          end if
3613        end if
3614        read(iun,*,iostat=istat) (fovbias(ii,j,k), k= 1, nbfov)
3615        if (istat /= 0) then
3616          call utl_abort('read_coeff: ERROR - reading fovbias in coeff file!')
3617        end if
3618        if (nbpred > 0) then
3619          read(iun,*,iostat=istat) (coeff(ii,j,k), k = 1, nbpred + 1)
3620        else
3621          read(iun,*,iostat=istat) dummy
3622        end if
3623        if (istat /= 0) then
3624          call utl_abort('read_coeff: ERROR - reading coeff in coeff file!')
3625        end if
3626      else
3627        exit
3628      end if
3629
3630    end do
3631
3632    if (ii == 0) then
3633      call utl_abort('read_coeff: ERROR - No data read from coeff file!')
3634    end if
3635
3636    nsat = ii
3637    nfov = nbfov
3638    nchan(ii) = j
3639
3640    write(*,*) ' '
3641    write(*,*) 'read_coeff: ------------- BIAS CORRECTION COEFFICIENT FILE ------------------ '
3642    write(*,*) ' '
3643    write(*,*) 'read_coeff: Number of satellites =     ', nsat
3644    write(*,*) 'read_coeff: Number of FOV =            ', nfov
3645    write(*,*) 'read_coeff: Max number of predictors = ', maxval(npred)
3646    write(*,*) ' '
3647    do i = 1, nsat
3648      write(*,*) 'read_coeff:  Satellite = ' // sats(i)
3649      write(*,*) 'read_coeff:     Number of channels = ', nchan(i)
3650      write(*,*) 'read_coeff:     predictors, fovbias, coeff for each channel: '
3651      do j = 1, nchan(i)
3652        write(*,*) i, chans(i, j)
3653        if (npred(i, j) > 0) then
3654          write(*,'(6(1X,A2))') (ptypes(i,j,k), k = 1, npred(i,j))
3655        else
3656          write(*,'(A)') 'read_coeff: No predictors'
3657        end if
3658        write(*,*) (fovbias(i,j,k), k = 1, nfov)
3659        write(*,*) (coeff(i,j,k), k = 1, npred(i,j) + 1)
3660      end do
3661    end do
3662    write(*,*) 'read_coeff: exit'
3663
3664    ier = fclos(iun)
3665
3666  end subroutine read_coeff
3667
3668  !-----------------------------------------
3669  ! bcs_getChannelIndex
3670  !-----------------------------------------
3671  subroutine bcs_getChannelIndex(obsSpaceData, idsat, chanIndx,indexBody)
3672    !
3673    !:Purpose: to get the channel index (wrt bcif channels)
3674    !
3675    implicit none
3676
3677    ! Arguments:
3678    integer, intent(in)              :: idsat, indexBody
3679    integer, intent(out)             :: chanIndx
3680    type(struct_obs), intent(inout)  :: obsSpaceData
3681
3682    ! Locals:
3683    logical, save :: first =.true.
3684    integer :: ichan, isensor, indx 
3685    integer, allocatable, save :: Index(:,:)
3686    
3687    if (first) then
3688      allocate(Index(tvs_nsensors,tvs_maxChannelNumber))
3689      Index(:,:) = -1
3690      do isensor = 1, tvs_nsensors
3691        channels:do ichan = 1,  tvs_maxChannelNumber
3692          indexes: do indx =1, bias(isensor)%numChannels
3693            if (ichan == bias(isensor)%chans(indx)%channelNum) then
3694              Index(isensor,ichan) = indx
3695              exit indexes
3696            end if
3697          end do indexes
3698        end do channels
3699      end do
3700      first = .false.
3701    end if
3702    
3703    ichan = nint(obs_bodyElem_r(obsSpaceData, OBS_PPP, indexBody))
3704    ichan = max(0, min(ichan, tvs_maxChannelNumber + 1))
3705    ichan = ichan - tvs_channelOffset(idsat)
3706    
3707    chanIndx = Index(idsat,ichan)
3708
3709  end subroutine bcs_getChannelIndex
3710
3711  !-----------------------------------------
3712  ! getObsFileName
3713  !-----------------------------------------
3714  function getObsFileName(codetype) result(fileName)
3715    !
3716    !:Purpose: Return the part of the observation file name associated
3717    !           with the type of observation it contains.
3718    !
3719    implicit none
3720
3721    ! Arguments:
3722    integer, intent(in) :: codeType
3723    character(len=20)   :: fileName
3724 
3725    if (codtyp_get_name(codeType) == 'radianceclear') then
3726      fileName  = 'csr'
3727    else if (codtyp_get_name(codeType) == 'mhs' .or. codtyp_get_name(codeType) == 'amsub') then
3728      fileName = 'to_amsub'
3729    else if (codtyp_get_name(codeType) == 'amsua') then
3730      fileName = 'to_amsua'
3731    else if (codtyp_get_name(codeType) == 'ssmi') then
3732      fileName = 'ssmis'
3733    else if (codtyp_get_name(codeType) == 'crisfsr') then
3734      fileName = 'cris'
3735    else
3736      fileName = codtyp_get_name(codeType)
3737    end if
3738    
3739  end function getObsFileName
3740
3741  !-----------------------------------------
3742  ! getInitialIdObsData
3743  !-----------------------------------------
3744  subroutine getInitialIdObsData(obsSpaceData, obsFamily, idObs, idData, codeTypeList_opt)
3745    !
3746    !:Purpose: Compute initial value for idObs and idData that will ensure
3747    !           unique values over all mpi tasks
3748    !
3749    implicit none
3750
3751    ! Arguments:
3752    type(struct_obs), intent(inout) :: obsSpaceData
3753    character(len=*), intent(in)    :: obsFamily    
3754    integer, intent(out)            :: idObs, idData
3755    integer, optional, intent(in)   :: codeTypeList_opt(:)
3756
3757    ! Locals:
3758    integer                :: headerIndex, numHeader, numBody, codeType, ierr
3759    integer, allocatable   :: allNumHeader(:), allNumBody(:)
3760
3761    numHeader = 0
3762    numBody = 0
3763    call obs_set_current_header_list(obsSpaceData, obsFamily)
3764    HEADERCOUNT: do
3765      headerIndex = obs_getHeaderIndex(obsSpaceData)
3766      if (headerIndex < 0) exit HEADERCOUNT
3767      if (present(codeTypeList_opt)) then
3768        codeType  = obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_ITY, headerIndex)
3769        if (all(codeTypeList_opt(:) /= codeType)) cycle HEADERCOUNT
3770      end if
3771      numHeader = numHeader + 1
3772      numBody = numBody + obs_headElem_i(obsSpaceData, OBS_NLV, headerIndex)
3773    end do HEADERCOUNT
3774    allocate(allNumHeader(mmpi_nprocs))
3775    allocate(allNumBody(mmpi_nprocs))
3776    call rpn_comm_allgather(numHeader, 1, 'mpi_integer',       &
3777                            allNumHeader, 1, 'mpi_integer', 'GRID', ierr)
3778    call rpn_comm_allgather(numBody, 1, 'mpi_integer',       &
3779                            allNumBody, 1, 'mpi_integer', 'GRID', ierr)
3780    if (mmpi_myid > 0) then
3781      idObs = sum(allNumHeader(1:mmpi_myid))
3782      idData = sum(allNumBody(1:mmpi_myid))
3783    else
3784      idObs = 0
3785      idData = 0
3786    end if
3787    deallocate(allNumHeader)
3788    deallocate(allNumBody)
3789
3790  end subroutine getInitialIdObsData
3791
3792end module biasCorrectionSat_mod
